We are looking for partners, investors and other collaborators to help empowering teachers worldwide and doing win-win business together with us!

We enable trust in AI by making algorithmic systems explainable for the people influenced by them. Our service allows organisations to cooperate in creating explainable AI systems built on a foundation of accountability. We connect our customers and their partners with an ecosystem of services, standards and certificates to validate the trustworthiness of their intelligent systems. Our mission is to help companies and governments develop and deploy responsible AI. Put simply, our technology platform helps you deliver explainable AI services that people can trust. Our vision for the future is one where people, organisations and smart systems are connected through openness, sharing, dialogue, and new forms of cooperation. Saidot is a diverse team of skilled individuals who share the passion for helping companies and governments in responsible advancement of AI. We believe that by enabling AI transparency, explainability and accountability in practice, we can help build trust between people and AI. Trust in today’s societies is crucial, and without it, no artificial intelligence system can operate successfully. So, by enabling people and organisations to cooperate in developing human-centric AI we help to build trust and accountability in AI systems.

Lifeclass has created a video-based online course on depression. The course is created together with Finland's leading mental health professionals. The modules are built around video interviews of professionals as well as people who have experienced depression – first hand or in the role of a loved one. Lifeclass believes a brighter tomorrow is based on understanding. The hiqh-quality videos offer everything that's needed to understand depression: its symptoms, causes and treatment. No one should struggle with depression alone. This is why Lifeclass' course is made for people who suffer from depression as well as their loved ones.

We Purify Water and Air. Our air is becoming more and more polluted. Estimations state that 16% of all deaths yearly are linked to pollution and according to WHO half of the world’s population will be living in water-stressed areas in 2025. Nanvio Technology excels at dealing with compounds that harm us and the environment. Catalytic surfaces are used in a wide range of areas, from producing chemicals, to cleaning vehicle emissions. In our field of research, light energy is utilized to activate a nano-coated surface which purifies air and water from toxic compounds, pesticides and microorganisms. Nanvio excels at dealing with compounds that cause problems in water recycling. Our technology expediently incapacitates drugs, pesticides and microorganisms, allowing recycling of water at a steady rate. We see clean air as a human right. By complementing today’s technologies for air purification, we can make a difference. Nanvio’s nano-forged surface activates from exposure to UV light, enabling a vigorous way for degrading pollutants, drug residues, microorganisms and more. We believe in a future where everyone has equal access to clean air and water.

Coral Road connects sustainable travel destinations with travelers who care about sustainability. Sustainable tourism is tourism that takes full account of its current and future economic, social and environmental impacts, addressing the needs of visitors, the industry, the environment, and host communities. We want to change the way we travel, and have our trips not only benefit ourselves, but also the environment, and the local community! Join us on our journey, and let's start a travel revolution! Every year, over 1 billion people travel worldwide. Travel has many benefits; as St. Augustine famously said, “The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.” However, its immense scale has detrimental effects on the environment and local communities. We believe that we can alleviate this problem by adopting travel habits that can mutually benefit everyone involved. We want to have our trips not only benefit ourselves, but also the environment, and local communities! Join us on our journey, and let's start a travel revolution!

Accelerate your green transition and sustainable growth. We analyze the impact you create as a company, ensure you have access to skills and capital - and thereby accelerate your green transition and growth. Sustainability and green change are a great opportunity for innovation, change and growth. In Denmark, we are at the forefront of our very ambitious goals. Valified helps your business, and Denmark, towards the goal, by accelerating your sustainable growth. Based on your concrete potential and challenges, Valified is an open gateway to relevant skills and resources as well as targeted capital that can accelerate your sustainability strategies, development and growth.

Halify AS operates on markets within the field of urban spatial area management, with a specific focus on Intelligent Transport Systems (ITS) and urban mobility. We have developed solutions for calculating and visualizing environmental impact made by transport industry for Norwegian municipalities, and take pride in visualizing difficult concepts and results in a way that is easy to convey. Our focus is on combining tools for intelligent data analysis while delivering a well designed user experience,positioning ourself as strong partner within innovative solutions targeted at professional and normal users alike. The core concept is based on identifying blocks of information and compare the degree of compability between them. This service is offered through a platform and is able to process seemingly unstructured, unrelated, non-sanitized data from different sources - from databases and sensors to figures and text.

Understand your carbon footprint, gain knowledge, act by doing deeds and become a role model. Sustainable living. Step by step. Deed by Deed. Our app will help you as an organisation to raise awareness of environmental questions among employees, create a culture around sustainability and create climate impact in a fun and engaging way.

Make It Good Again aims to break with the throw-away mentality, by making it easier and cheaper to get your broken items repaired. This is done through our website https://makeitgoodagain.dk/, with 3 easy steps: 1. The customer describes what is broken and put it up for the repairmen to give their bid on how much they can repair it for. 2. The repairmen participate in a reversed auction, to give the lowest bid on the repair. 3. The customer chooses their preferred offer. It doesn't have to be the cheapest. It can also be the most convenient, with the highest ratings or whatever other parameter is most important for the customer. We are passionate about our company and work hard to reach our potential.

The Pitch Almenr is a new platform for collaboration that makes it easier and faster for people to come together and create communities. The What Families come in many forms, we are mobile, our lifestyles are far more diverse than they were 50 years ago. Therefore, the real estate market's one-size-fits-all buildings and supply no longer match the need. Families come in many forms, we are mobile, our lifestyles are far more diverse than they were 50 years ago. Therefore, the real estate market's one-size-fits-all buildings and supply no longer match the need. General building communities make it easy to build and live together. The How Online and offline matching service. Here, you subscribe to one or more interest lists, and you are profiled and matched with other home seekers with similar lifestyle and community dreams. And finally, you formulate the common dream with the help of Almenr's designers. As a member of Almenr you also get access to lots of inspiration about social ways of living. The Why Almenr has set out to innovate the village! We create communities around the home and rethink the way we create housing communities. We call it Village 2.0 and our motto is “More. Together". Our vision is to create a village-scale human society - with far more housing communities of all kinds - a more diverse, sustainable and social real estate market under residents' conditions. And we do this through an international, cooperative platform that, with modern tools, helps create communities and will revolutionize the financing of housing.

Dianox is a biotechnology startup for diagnostics of infectious diseases. We produce early diagnostic screening tools to make a sustainable impact on global health. We are at an early stage, so there is a lot of room to grow. With us you have great opportunity to take ownership, and put your mark on the company. If you are excited about this project's impact potential please get in touch. If you are excited about this project's impact potential please apply to one of our openings.

The Pitch Matter is a fintech startup with pensions specialized in impact investments. We are building a digitally native pension company to scratch to: - Channel pension savings away from investments in oil, coal, arms, tobacco and other harmful assets towards sustainable and responsible assets that can improve the world around us. - Improve the customer experience of pension savings and give people a meaningful and purposeful pension product. The What Allocating pension savings to impact investments The How Our core principle is the ground-breaking idea that the value of your senior years depends much more on the world around you than the number on your bank account. We aim to invest with the goal of achieving a financial return and a positive impact on society and the environment by focusing 100% on sustainable investments. The Why Our pension savings represent one of the largest resources available for investments. Sadly, our pensions are currently often invested in harmful and irresponsible assets that erode our planet and society. We want to change that.

We’re a corporate innovation and venture development firm. We create, accelerate, and scale new business with the world’s leading corporations and entrepreneurs. Our multidisciplinary team consists of some of the most experienced venture builders, strategists, engineers, designers, data scientists and growth experts around. A company’s DNA is only set once. At Rainmaking we started out as entrepreneurs. People who came together to use their experiences to build impactful businesses. Whilst our activities have evolved, the entrepreneurial spirit is hardwired into our culture. We still approach every business, as if it were our own. Today, we solve challenges across the landscape of innovation. We work with companies and organizations of all shapes and sizes, from early-stage startups to Fortune 500 corporates. Our multidisciplinary team gathers venture builders, engineers, designers, data scientists, and growth experts. Over the last 12 years, we have expanded our global reach. There are now 10 Rainmaking Innovation Studios around the world, in addition to Startupbootcamp, our accelerator program, and Talent Garden Rainmaking, our workspaces for startups and innovation teams.

Laturi Corporation Ltd is a welfare technology company established in Oulu in 2012. Laturi has extensive expertise in technology, health and physical activity. We work together with leading service providers in the field of wellness. Together with our partners, we will bring more power to work communities through innovative solutions for well-being at work. High quality, easy and cost-effective. The Energy test is a patented and award-winning product developed by Laturi, which has already inspired hundreds of work communities around Finland to measure and monitor their well-being. The Energy test provides information on health status, body performance, and hence the overall energy level. The health assessments used in the test and the Energy index calculation model are based on extensive international science data. The Energy test is a patented and award winning welfare analysis. The Energy test consists of three components: welfare issues, body measurements and a light fitness test. It is easy to get the Energy test regardless of fitness level. The Energy test can be done easily at home through Energy Service or as a guided team test. We also offer tailor-made Energy Coaching services to work communities, together with a comprehensive service network throughout Finland.

eXerium is a Finnish start-up company whose mission to provide ergonomic wellness solutions to activate core muscles and to improve body balance via gamification. In the design of the products, special attention has been paid to the natural needs and instincts of people, making them suitable for almost everyone, furthermore, using the products is really fun. The company's key members have been doing research and development work on health gaming since 2003. Cooperation is established with several internationally acclaimed experts in healthcare, application development, special furniture production, ergonomics and top sports.

Savvie is developing a user-friendly mobile-first digital assistant which will contribute to the triple bottom line of helping businesses, society, and the planet. Our business optimization tool leverage data and machine learning to help food businesses make the right decisions for improving their operations and increase profitability while reducing waste at its source. Unlike existing solutions, Savvie aims to create a business optimization tool that is highly intuitive and requires no training to use. In contrast to the closest competitors in the market, we are operating on the prevention side - helping food businesses optimize their operations while aiding them in the reduction of overproduction and waste. The background of the project is based on thorough research on waste in the food industry, mapping out current processes and assessing user needs as well as the market potential. According to Project Drawdown (2020), food waste reduction has the potential to reduce global emissions by 88 gigatons by 2050 - making it the most effective way to combat climate change. According to ReFED (2020), the biggest sources of food waste come from stakeholders at the end of the value chain - households and consumer-facing food businesses. As a result, we are targeting consumer-facing businesses as they are responsible for approximately 40% of all food waste. They also have a financial incentive in reducing what is thrown out. Forecasting is one of the major issues to be solved. Today, food businesses are forecasting predominantly based on experience and gut-feeling. Solving this problem alone has the potential to save the global food industry 22 trillion NOK each year, and the Norwegian food industry 91 billion NOK a year. Consequently, this is a significant market opportunity.

Sparla is a financial fitness app. We help to build better financial habits for the greater good. Our solution: 1) Leverage Open Banking technologies to build an effortless budget 2) Leverage nudging and gamification to build better habits 3) Offers from low-cost sustainable brands to simplify the transition to a more sustainable lifestyle - good for your wallet and the planet.

Oyama is a mental health company on a journey to enable individuals to become balanced, sustainable humans. We are creating an evidence-based self-guided app with AI-assisted personalized self-care recommendations to help prevent depression. We have developed, Oyama, a platform to talk about your life challenges. We provide personalized, evidence-based tools from psychotherapy to understand yourself better and a peer-support community to encourage you on your journey. When a user enters the Oyama app, they join an anonymous community, where one can relate to other users’ stories. You can give helpful advice and positively reinforce one another. At the core of our app is our personalized journal, which teaches you to express yourself and guides you through a motion of evidence-based psychotherapy exercises to help you build healthy and sustainable habits. These exercises will help the users reflect on their thoughts, emotions, levels of stress, difficulties and possible relationship problems on a regular basis. We are introducing a unique pedagogical user-experience with gamified and interactive features, which will allow outcomes to be continuously monitored and followed up, reinforcing the learned healthy behavioral patterns. Currently, we rolling out our beta to consumers and high schools in Sweden and Finland and starting a collaboration with a Finnish occupational healthcare company. Additionally, we wish to deliver our new mobile app focusing on social support as soon as possible in the midst of a historical period in time, the COVID-19 pandemic.

Our cities are growing and becoming more dense, making an efficient use of space increasingly important. We need to reduce the energy used in and emissions coming from transports. And who doesn't want to get from A to B faster than before with a big smile on their face? We are introducting a unique and futuristic cyclecab service that will reduce the need for taxi cars in dense urban areas, offer faster and more fun trips, save energy and emissions and offer attractive and healthy employment opportunities for people set on getting into the workforce.

Coach Nation App is the new platform to book online and outdoor elite coaches. Our main goal is to enable individuals and companies to increase energy, commitment and productivity thanks to personal training. The digitalisation of society and more recently the coronavirus world pandemic has had a huge impact in the fitness industry forcing it to reinvent itself to be more based on live online and outdoor training. People have a lot of difficulties to find motivation and commit themselves to practice a regular physical activity. At the same time coaches want more freedom and can't focus 100 % on coaching due to a lot of different tasks related to their profession (Clients search, Accounting, Training Programs creation, Marketing, Administration Tasks...) Our mobile app enables clients to easily find and book the right elite coaches. They benefit from the live online 1 to 1 or group session and the digital training programs. No matter what their busy schedules are, clients will now always find a way to train and feel better in their daily life. Also with Coach Nation App coaches are more efficient and independent (Easy Booking & Payment, Chat, Live online 1 to 1 & Group session, Invoices downloads, Digital training programs,...).

At Klimate we work with Carbon Dioxide Removal through Direct Air Capture of CO2. We are developing a household carbon capture system, that can be scaled and mainstream for future urban and rural capture of CO2. We are currently designing the future product, and are looking for funding for the development process. We are driven by the fact that we need to reverse climate change, and secure a sustainable future in planet earth. The first step in developing a household carbon capture solutions is to establish a facility in large scale on a location with excess energy. Therefore, we are in contacts with Samsoe to explore the island as a test location. The funding will go towards salaries for development, materials and physical establishment of hardware.

AI | Wind Energy | Predictive Maintenance | IoT | SaaS that helps wind farm operators scale. Our mission is to realize the potential of AI to maximize wind turbine performance and thus accelerate the transition towards a society powered by renewable energy. We specialize in AI for predictive maintenance in Wind Power and help our clients scale their O&M business. Our signed clients own and operate more than 10.000 wind turbines globally, and they have acute growing pains that we help them solve. Vertikal's novel AI technology improves condition monitoring efficiency 10-fold and improves asset performance through early fault detection months earlier than traditional technology.

We are taking digitalization to the next level. A level where we enable our users to live a seamless lifestyle through everyday life activities by carrying our smart biometric chip implants. Our vision is to strive for seamless connectivity based on the users choice preferences. We are proud to state with confidence that everyone should join the Biohax Community to be part of this revolutionary journey, hyper technological advancements, and connectivity. We aim together with the community to keep building the Internet of Us™ while simultaneously bridging the gap between IoT and IoU™ as more and more are choosing a seamless experience with connected things. We are keen on quality and industry standard practices. We only use the world's most passionate and experienced biometric chip implanter(s) who has more than a decade of experience and expertise in the biohacking field with a well-established standard and platform in place to safe guard and protect our users.

Zeipt is bridging the gap between physical and digital financial services, by creating an open eco-system for digital receipt distribution. We enable retailers to replace paper receipts, by enabling them to automatically send their receipt to the digital interface of the consumers choice - such as their online bank, mobile wallet or accounting software. Our solution is RaaS (Receipt-as-a-service), an API-service that provides a standard for digital receipts. By integrating with POS systems and the tokenization software in payment terminals, our system fetches the receipt when a customer makes a purchase with their card or digital payment medium and automatically sends it to the customer fully replacing the need of paper receipt.

ZAPTEC is a world leader in intelligent charging systems for electric vehicles. The global shift to electric vehicles will bring forward significant challenges in charging infrastructure. By combining its unique power electronics technology with cloud-connected and scalable charging solutions, ZAPTEC is able to put forward working solutions based on real experience from the country with the highest EV per capita in the world. ZAPTEC is headquartered in Stavanger, Norway, and all products are designed, developed and manufactured in Norway.

Xzero is a Swedish company that has spent 20 years in R&D for a new technology for process water in the micro- and nanoelectronics industries. The basic idea is to recycle the water from waste water into Ultrapure Water. The most recent challenge has been to remove nanoparticles in order to make sure these are not spread in the environment and not enter the Ultrapure Water used in cleaning of the nanoelectronics. Third party tests done by The Royal Institute of Technology and Swedish Environmental Research Institute (Sweden), Clarkson University (US), Manta Inc (US) and Anton Paar (Austria) have confirmed that Xzero technology is more efficient than existing technologies in removing nanoparticles from water. In January 2015, Xzero started to industrialize the technology in co-operation with researchers at the Royal Institute of technology in Stockholm, Sweden and at the leading European organization for microelectronics development – imec in Leuven, Belgium. Testing of the first full scale prototype of the industrialized equipment commenced in August 2016. In order to complement the researchers already working on the project, Xzero is recruiting experienced and professional engineers for the industrialization work and experienced sales people for tha marketing.

Xigrid Technologies is a company founded with a mission to improve people’s quality of life and address global challenges with technology. Periods of low tenant occupancy present an outstanding opportunity for harvesting savings resulting from reduced energy usage. Seizing this opportunity, however, depends on an ability to pinpoint and immediately stop energy leaks. Our technology synchronizes your tenants energy consumption with their actual needs. Deployment is fast and easy. There is no cost for installation (this is subject to technical feasibility, of course). The resulting savings are shared between you and us. The company strongly believes that the primary purpose of any technology is to serve people. Apart from that, technology is also a go-to solution when it comes to addressing global challenges, like climate change, air, water, soil pollution, and alike.

We provide unique patented technology for recycling mixed plastic waste and other hard-to-recycle waste streams. Our operations include the project deliveries and licensing of the production technology. Our technology delivery includes equipment for the entire process from raw material treatment to the production of final products. Our technology provides the possibility to recycle raw material fractions that are difficult or even impossible to utilize using other technologies. We provide composite products that are manufactured at our own production plants. All our products are made of our own ecological composite, Wemix®. Recycled plastic and various recycled fibres are used as the raw material of our composite products.

Weecos is the first marketplace in Finland and other Nordic countries focusing just on sustainable design and independent brands. When Weecos.com was launched in 2013, the need for products respecting people and the planet was in a great increase. Bold, sustainable brands were founded all the time in Finland and around the world. These brands, however, were very hard to find or far beyond reach. This inspired us to develop a solution – a digital centre of sustainable lifestyle and a counterforce for disposable shopping culture, Weecos. From the very first steps of Weecos, we have had two goals. First, we want that the quality products of the sustainable brands are easy to find by those customers who want to purchase products and services reliably and according to their values. Second, we want to change people’s attitudes towards a more conscious way to consume and a sustainable lifestyle. We must take care of our planet and keep it viable. Our vision is that within five years, Weecos is the digital home of the global Weecos tribe who want to be game changers and are looking for an inspirational, sustainable lifestyle. We believe in the power of community, reliability and transparency in everything we do.

Digital waste management with the app - easy, simple and effective! WasteApp removes unnecessary "noise and hassle" when it comes to waste management. Easy, simple and efficient ordering of container emptying.Complete documentation - everything logged. Full overview of suppliers and containers. Individually adapted - also for the individual user.

Warrior Coffee is a Finland based coffee company. With our very own specialty coffee roastery (Organic Certified), we serve to a wide range of customers, such as work places and offices, coffee shops and retailers. We also specialize in concepts for the office, including fresh coffee deliveries, equipment, training and barista services. Our passion is to help companies develop their work culture via coffee. Our ultimate goal is to create pure products with an amazing taste. Products that do not only taste good but makes your everyday life much more pleasant.

Intelligent electricity, climate friendly & cheaper. There is no doubt that we, the energy consumers, want to support the transition toward renewable, environmentally friendly energy. Turning intent into action is all too often a cumbersome and complicated affair. True Energy's mission is to offer customers automatic use of electricity when it is most climate-friendly and cheapest. Our solutions work for a broad range of products, including electric vehicles and home appliances. At the centre of our services is our user-friendly App that can automate and optimize energy consumption based on your preferences.

We believe that second hand trade is an important key to make the world more sustainable. However, even though most people acknowledge this, their barriers are still too high to take action, and they still have too many nice things just laying around unused. To sell your items through a traditional classified service is a timely process and for many it is embarrassing or even stigmatic. Our main focus is the app for iOS and Android called Tise. Tise (as in "advertise") is a marriage between Instagram and Craigslist for selling and discovering second hand fashion, interior and furniture. We believe that everyone wants to be a part of the green movement and just needs a little motivation and the right tool to get going. Tise increases your incentives for selling in a fun and inspiring way, while on the other hand lets you go second-hand treasure hunting in your own neighbourhood every day.

We make energy greener, smarter and cheaper. With smart technology, no bigger than an app in your phone, Tibber replaces your traditional power company. It’s technology that not only charges your home with cheap, green energy but also makes sure you consume less – so that both our planet and your paycheck last longer.” We believe in using digital technology to make electricity consumption smarter.

We offer an effective solution for you to remotely control and monitor your home temperature Tempiro is a solution based on a patent application to control devices via fuses, a unique innovation that can easily make your home smarter, more comfortable and more energy efficient. Tempiro's Smart Home solution lets you monitor & control any electrical HVAC device remotely, saving money, reducing insecurity and increasing comfort for house owners and residential buildings.

Tanktwo develops and sells algorithm-based battery optimization solutions for large loads, such as Electrical Vehicles. Despite decades of billion-dollar investments in the development of improved battery technology, EV drivers and engineers alike are far from satisfied with current battery performance. Rather than attempt to force breakthroughs in electrochemistry, Tanktwo searches for inspiration and innovative solutions in seemingly unrelated industries. Founded in 2012, Tanktwo is a Finnish-American startup dedicated to drastically improving EV performance through the application of established principles from other industries within battery technology. Here at Tanktwo, we draw inspiration from mobile networks, internet routing protocols, and consumer electronics industries, and utilise data-driven methods in ensuring that our batteries perform at a significantly higher level of efficiency.

TagTomat works to create sustainable cities, where communities sprout around urban gardens, and the city's residual materials are upcycles and revitalized with a circular aesthetic. TagTomat is a small, but fast moving urban gardening company, that by a disruptive approach to design and userdriven projects, now creates green jobs and products within the urban fabric. Our approach to knowledge is Open Source, and we have documented many projects and products on our blog and Youtube channel, so feel free to be inspired and share our ideas.

Superstainable® is a certified sustainable lifestyle brand. Superstainable® was founded in the autumn of 2016 with the mission of creating the most sustainable uncompromised products and services while minimizing the environmental impact. Our timeless lifestyle products rely on quality, consciousness and of course all styles are made in organic, recycled or sustainable materials, with the right certifications. We focus on developing the most uncompromising quality lifestyle products and we believe that sustainability should be a natural part of being a modern business.

At Netflea, buying and selling 2nd hand goods is much easier than trading at typical marketplaces. Europe is full of products that are not being used by the owner but that are still valuable for someone else. Netflea is a unique way to shop preloved items online. The items are sold by consumers to consumers completely hassle-free, because we act as a trusted third party between the consumers. This way full consumer rights are guaranteed to the buyer and the seller alike. You can buy items online from multiple sellers using one shopping cart. All items will be sent to you in one parcel with one flat rate shipping fee. The seller enjoys similar ease of selling. You just decide which items you don’t need any more, and take a photo, write a short description and decide the price for each. Then you simply pack everything to one box, send it to us, and then just wait a while.

Remote Piloting of Underwater ROV. The goal of the platform is to gather in one place all the tools needed for effective remote underwater surveys and operations, thereby saving extensive time and travel while opening new possibilities to involve any participants from anywhere in your operations. Underwater operations are executed by marine contractors using ROVs (underwater drones) or divers. Internet connectivity though 4G/5G networks is improving every day and video streaming and conferencing are now standard tools for remote work. But underwater operations are still most often local processes where all participants need to come on site to follow operations in a cramped and uncomfortable container on a quay side or on the deck of a vessel. We aim to close this gap with a straightforward tool to enable remote subsea operations.

Plant a green mindset with a Sprout®PENCIL Sprout breaks with the idea of a linear value chain, which starts with the extraction of resources and end up as waste. Therefor, Sprout products are a countermove to the "Take, Make, Dispose" culture. Our approach to product development is, that they must be part of solutions to global challenges, such as abuse of nature’s scarce resources and overuse. Sprout pencils are the original plantable pencils. Patented and guaranteed to be of the highest quality. All aspects of the Sprout pencil are sustainable and non-toxic – from the biodegradable seed capsule to the 100% natural clay and graphite core and PEFC/FSC-certified wood.Regardless of whether you choose Sprout pencils in color or in grey, they are a joy to use. And when it’s time to stop writing and start planting, you’ll find it’s just as much fun to watch the seeds turn into plants. All Sprout seeds have been selected because they are easy to germinate. So you can enjoy vibrant flowers, fragrant herbs or fresh vegetables.

Plug & Produce end-of-arms-tools for cobots Too many employees world-wide struggling with overuse injury of bag, shoulder, arms and wrist because of repetitive work. It is our mission to enable small and medium enterprises to cost-effectively automate high-mix and low-volume production tasks, by introducing intelligent tooling for collaborative robots. We provide true plug-n-produce robotic tools – easy to mount, program and deploy in a production line. AI, machine learning, sensing and active robotic control will provide the necessary intelligence require to achieve true plug-n-produce functionality even in complicated applications and processes. It is our vision to remove manual and repetitive tasks in industrial production. Spin Robotics envision a near future where collaborative robots empowering people by enabling true collaborative work where robots are working alongside humans – the robot become a tool to ensure a better working environment resulting in higher productivity. Our goal is to provide Plug-n-Produce robotic tools that are easy-to-use, cost-efficient and safe alongside human workers.

We put BRAINS into your industrial control systems, Giving you real-time information to act on Most industries and buildings house older systems do not fully cooperate with the connected world. By providing wireless data collection, monitoring, optimization and visualization all in one package, our products enable you to work smarter and stay on top of the game. At Smart Plants, we work to give you complete monitorial power of your machines, processes, buildings and everything connectable. We care about how efficient you want your work to be and this, we help maximizing all through a single, intuitive live dashboard.Behind the screens, we provide and make use of data collection, cloud-solutions, machine learning, automation and real-time monitoring. This enables you to learn more about your systems and performances with historic data and reports, and make better decisions as a consequence. The industries of our focus stand for 1/3 of global CO2 emissions. Through our knowledge and resources, we work to lower these emissions in a way which also increases efficiency and reduces expenses.

Simplifying gas delivery services LPG and industrial gases are a vital part of our energy system, and we will be dependent of it for many decades to come. However, the systems used to transport and distribute gas cylinders are creating a massive and unnecessary carbon footprint. Distribution systems are expensive, ineffective and dated. Gas delivery logistics rely heavily on manual operations, and this is a big problem. Smart Cylinders provides a system for real time monitoring of gas cylinders, which makes it easy for gas suppliers and distributors to optimize their logistics, cut costs, and create a hassle-free solution for their customers. We believe our system can create a new standard for the LPG industry.

Enterprise resource optimisation for the wind industry What if maintenance and construction of energy assets could be designed and executed in far less time, with better utilised resources and equipment, and increased production? Shoreline is an enterprise SaaS provider of intelligent simulation and optimization solutions for project development and field operations management for wind energy assets. Powered by state of the art simulation technology with a built-in artificial intelligence engine, Shoreline software simulates an endless number of complex supply chain, field service, workflow, and asset performance scenarios with speed and precision to find the optimal scenario. Decision-makers can use our Design solution for scenario analysis during project development and our Execution solutions for construction and maintenance work scheduling, resource management, and reporting, reducing risk and achieving safer, more cost-efficient operations and increased production. Shoreline is the brainchild of Norwegian engineer Ole Erik Vestøl Endrerud, who conceived the idea while conducting his PhD at UiS - The University of Stavanger. Observing the way the industry works, Ole saw a need for a game-changing re-design of the key aspects of renewable energy asset management at every stage of the asset lifecycle. Doing so would enable the industry to effectively scale its activities, improving the ability to quickly and more sustainably deploy renewable energy around the world.

Sensinite will deliver the next generation sensors that will revolutionize machine and wearable sensing Sensinite technology can detect and measure ionizing radiation from high energy ultra violet to gamma and neutron radiation in addition to charged particles with an independent, ready to use and intelligent sensor module. Industrial transimaging mode allows to see through any made objects and form images of internal structures on a level of detail previously unseen. This will be achieved by combining digital x-ray, gamma and neutron detectors. This way studying objects is also called industrial neutron radiographic testing or industrial radiographic testing.Medical transimaging mode allows you to form images of internal structures of organic matter, large or small, on a level of detail previously unseen. This will be achieved by combining both digital x-ray and neutron detectors. This is also called medical radiography or medical CT-scanning. We believe evolution must be accelerated in order to gain healthier and safer world and sustainable way of life. The acceleration can only be done with advanced technology based on solid science.Our technology will give us all improved capabilities and will accelerate the evolution of how we see the world.

Anomaly detection system for utilities Our mission with Sense Analytics is to reduce waste and streamline processes in capital-intensive companies. We believe that data, which is already present within many companies, has an unfulfilled potential to do so. We are currently working with a range of water utilities in Denmark, developing a statistical tool to alarm them about new leak occurrences. We use machine learning and advanced statistical analysis to analyse flow-data. This allows us to identify new leaks and inform the utilities accordingly. This, in turn, allows the companies to react faster to new damages on the pipes and reduce the non-revenue water, benefitting both the environment and the bottom-line.

All the right ingredients – In a capsule. To maintain optimal function of the brain, muscles, immune system and so on, the body requires a steady supply of raw materials. Large amounts of macronutrients – proteins, fats, and carbohydrates – are needed. While only a small number of nutrients such as vitamins are absolutely essential, failing to get enough of them guarantees health problems and suboptimal performance. Rohtos Labs utilizes all types of micronutrients. Proteins, amino acids, fatty acids, vitamins and minerals in varying biochemical forms. Diverse phytonutrients, both as “full-spectrum” extracts – containing all the constituents of the original plant, some of them in higher amounts than found in nature, and as isolated singular compounds extracted from plants.

ReMoni is all about saving resources in an inexpensive, intelligent and easy way. By monitoring your technical installations with clamp-on sensors that are fixed directly on your existing cables and pipes, there’s resources and money to be saved. Our wireless IoT sensors are self-learning, and thanks to AI they generate warnings and foresee breakdowns. The system is coherent. Our end-to-end solution is characterized by its robust and easy set-up. Other benefits? It’s inexpensive. The entire solution cost less than a fifth of the known alternatives to buy, install, and run. Our goal is to create technology that helps to build a more sustainable society, by eliminating waste of resources.

Upcycled textiles designed for circularity. Currently, only 25% of the 95% of textiles that can be recycled actually are. Critically, it’s not just our materials themselves that challenge conventional thinking; it’s also the process of working with them. As they act as a creative palette, exploring their use inevitably reveals opportunities for circular collaboration and design. At Really, we upcycle end-of-life textiles into premium-quality engineered materials suitable for industrial-scale projects: Solid Textile Board and Acoustic Textile Felt. Fashion brands, designers and architects use these to create beautiful furniture and interiors, challenge convention and inspire collaborations.

We make fashion sustainable. Before a shirt is worn for the first time it has been through more steps than most customers realize. Often one producer makes the yarn, another knits or weaves it into textile fabric, and a third makes the shirt from the fabric. Now it’s ready for the customer to wear.When garments are worn out or no longer wanted some are sold second-hand or used as hand-me-downs, but the vast majority end up in landfills or are incinerated. Much too few are recycled due to the fact that cotton and viscose can’t be recycled with satisfactory quality on a large enough scale. The cycle stops, because there is a hole in the loop, a crucial part is missing. Our recycling technology dissolves used cotton and other natural fibers into a new, biodegradable raw material, Circulose pulp. It can be turned into textile fiber, be fed into the textile production cycle and meet industry specifications. This is the link that has been missing from the cycle. We have closed the loop. The way fashion is produced and consumed can finally be transformed into a never-ending loop. If the world’s population increases as expected, there will be 8.5 billion people by 2030. And as the population grows, apparel consumption grows with it. But producing even more apparel will have significant impact on water use, CO2 emissions, use of chemicals and waste disposal. It’s not sustainable. Something has to change. Our process of recycling cotton fibers and viscose fibers uses less water and chemicals, emits less CO2 and prolongs the usage of the world’s resources. More used cotton garments can be collected and the volume of garments made from our recycled, biodegradable textile fibers can increase. If one kilo of clothing is recycled instead of being produced from virgin sources, it saves thousands of liters of water and decreases emissions of both CO2 and chemicals.

At Pure Waste, we are on a mission to change the global textile industry. We make 100% ecologically sustainable yarns, fabrics and garments, and save a whole lot of water by doing it our way. Cotton is a natural fibre, yet it causes severe stress to the environment. The crop uses a lot of water, but many growers are in areas where there is little rainfall. It takes around 11 000 litres of unpolluted water to grow 1 kilogram of cotton. That means a single t-shirt requires as much as 2700 litres of water. We don't make our products from virgin material. Instead, Pure Waste recycles the offcuts and spinning waste from clothing and textile industries. The raw material is collected, sorted by colour and quality, and mechanically opened back into the fibre. Then we mix it with recycled polyester or viscose and spin it into new yarns. After that, the process is the same as with virgin materials except that our yarns and fabrics don’t need to be dyed as their colour comes from the textile waste. “Pure Waste” is our promise to use only materials that would otherwise go to waste. We also wish to challenge the whole perception of waste. Pure Waste is recycling upgraded. Our vision is to recreate the fashion industry, and lead it into a future of sustainability. We want to industrialise textile upcycling globally as a common practice.

We make sustainability measurable, structured and simple Sustainability as a field has virtually exploded over the past years, with new dimensions added continuously. It has become a field that requires specialized knowledge of environmental, financial and social frameworks. Working efficiently according to a set-out strategy and sustainability agenda requires a dedicated tool that houses not only all sustainability data, but also the specialized functions and knowledge needed to reach goals and fulfil strategies. Position Green is a data-driven platform tailored to support organizations to collect, manage, visualize and report sustainability data in one and the same place. Achieve a simpler, smarter and more efficient approach to sustainability reporting. Gaining access to accurate and traceable data allows you to raise awareness, take action and make progress towards a more sustainable organization. Position Green helps you become a champion of sustainability. Our proprietary software captures, visualizes, analyzes, manages and reports sustainability data in an accurately and efficient manner. Our web-based tool has a unique scheme with a simple and dynamic setup to meet each companies specific needs. We are driven by a common purpose: to develop the world’s best sustainability platform

We bring electric car charging to all parking areas How to easily enable charging in a multi-stakeholder real estate settings? Parking Energy offers the whole value chain as a one integrated service, resulting in reliability, affordability and seamless user experience.

We develop technological solutions for underwater activities with a main focus on diving. Paralenz is a startup with dedicated product engineers, designers, and water sports enthusiasts. The Paralenz Dive Camera is the first underwater action camera developed specifically for divers. From developing our products and engaging with our community, we want to confront environmental indifference and inspire people to speak for the Ocean - as a seamless part of the dive.Through empowering divers across the globe, we will help reverse the steep decline of life beneath the surface. Dive by dive.

Önling designs unique knits and Slow fashion. We believe that the fashion industry needs to change by producing better products that last longer and are environmentally friendly. Önling was founded in 2015 by Katrine Hannibal and Lotte Ronan, with the purpose of creating our customers’ favourite clothing. We have a belief that women use 20% of their wardrobe 80% of the time - these pieces are her favourite clothes, that she will use again and again for many different occasions. Önling wants to design and create those 20% absolute favourites for your wardrobe. We take it so seriously that we named our company according to this belief: Önling means favourite in Danish. Önling believes in classic design, responsible production, natural material and a long lifetime. These values transcend everything we do and all our designs - whether it is a shirt in organic cotton or a knitting pattern for a sweater, that you hand knit and own and love for the next 20 years. We design classic Nordic knitting patterns and produce our own sustainable yarns at a family-owned yarn mill in Italy - all based on a belief, that in order for our designs to be your favourites, they must be produced in good quality, natural materials. We believe that the fashion industry needs to change by producing better products that last longer and are environmentally friendly. When wool is used for hand knitting, it becomes sustainable in its own way. When you produce your new favorite garment with your own hands and knitting needles, this happens with minimal environmental impact. Completely without discharge from production and pollution from packaging and transport. And the lifetime of beautiful clothing produced by yourself is very long.

Ochno enable buildings to quickly and affordably implement the next generation technology that reduces energy consumption while creating an attractive and flexible interior design. Ochno is first and so far the only solution offering energy efficiency and smartness utilizing the new open standard, USB Type C for flexible office environment and buildings. Ochno measure, optimize and steer work environment to ensure a holistic view on sustainability. Sustainable infrastructure and sustainable work force. Their vision is to disrupt and develop, be part of key contributors to reach the UN global goals for sustainability.

Ocean Sun introduces an efficient, low cost and durable solution to floating solar. Our core innovation is a floating solar system based on rigid PV modules mounted on a hydroelastic membrane. The method enables lower cell operating temperatures by direct thermal contact with the waterbody. Systems can be built at a low capex and the best PV performance in the industry. Floating solar has already today been installed in a quantity of ~2.4GWp and is creating major opportunities to scale up solar energy production around the world. According to a report from the World Bank, the global potential of floating solar, even under moderate assumptions, is 2000 GWp on man-made reservoirs alone. Adding opportunities on near shore, rivers, larger lakes and other locations so far not feasible for current mainstream floating solar technology; the potential becomes enormous! Due to Ocean Sun’s patented technology and its many benefits a substantial share of future installations will be on our platform.

Molecular health - from our lab to your door step Nutrinovate’s products are based on the innovative drug delivery platform Functional Film Technology™ to transport substances into the body via the Oral Mucosa. The platform, FFT™, has been developed in Sweden and is the result of ten years of research and development. An innovation that is a safe, fast and easy way to exploit the untapped health benefits of various molecules. A sophisticated solution made from natural ingredients with only one purpose - to help the body to absorb otherwise limited or slowly absorbed substanses. By combining unconventional thinking, progressive working methods and our overall competence (several decades in research and the traditional pharmaceutical industry, we solve problems in a customer oriented manner. Our basic philosophy is to improve the health of individuals and the entire planet with a product range that retrieves its power from well-known and proven substances combined with an innovative approach.

THE NEW GENERATION OF SCAFFOLDING PLATFORMS .. with safety in focus! Based on an idea to create an alternative to scaffolding decks made of wood, aluminium or steel Nordic Platform developed and materialized the creation of Airsteps - composite scaffolding decks of high quality. In 2018, the company expanded their product portfolio with their Ocean Plastic line, where Nordic Platform makes scaffolding accessories of recyclable ocean plastic, making an important contribution to environmental protection. So far, spacefillers, safetycaps, fall protection, toeboard clips and safety clips will be made mainly of ocean plastic - without compromising quality and strength in the products. Purchasing these products makes a difference by pulling plastic, fishing nets, etc. up from the ocean and remanufacturing it into new product. Helping both the oceanic animals, humans towards minimizing the intake of microplastic and moving toward clean oceans – benefitting all on this earth.

Next generation software for safer, efficient and more reliable ship operations. Over 75% of 20,000+ marine accidents every year occur due to human error. Although heavily regulated, Shipping is still one of the most dangerous industries to work in. Seafarers are not given the most, modern, cutting-edge tools to ensure that their work environment is safe. The Shipping Industry is especially lagging in the adoption of technology in day-to-day operations. With simplified instructions, work-planning tools and predictive risk capabilities, Nautix's Fleet Management software improves safety and efficiency, resulting in 10-30% savings due to reduced incident costs. The Fleet Management software with built-in intelligence: OPERATIONS SCHEDULING AND PLANNING / DIGITAL WORK INSTRUCTIONS / INTEGRATED SAFETY WORKFLOW / OPERATIONAL PERFORMANCE At Nautix, we are pioneering a 'sea-change' in the way our industry functions. The industry has a reactive approach to Accidents. Our approach is proactive. Improved Process controls would prevent accidents from ever occuring in the first place. We believe in the collaborative future of Humans and Technology - a future where the Industry works smarter and safer while experiencing an improved work experience.

MicroAtmos operates on the field of Biotechnology and Cleantech. We are focusing on future-orientated products, processes and services, which are sustainable for our environment. MicroAtmos is offering a link between academic research and industry by making demonstrators to fasten the commercialisation of innovations.

Metry is a global directory for energy data that helps energy consumers to discover potential energy savings in buildings, businesses and households. Buildings still consume 40% of the world’s energy. United Nations state that with existing technology, buildings worldwide could reduce their energy consumption with 30-80%. What’s stopping the industry is obviously not the amount of generated data, but a lack of structure, aggregation and transparency. Today’s scattered and silo-located data makes AI driven energy efficiency impossible to apply. Additionally, it makes large-scale reporting complicated, affecting anyone working with budgeting, sustainability reports, billing and energy tax reductions. On the Metry platform energy users can collect, organize and connect their energy data to third party services. Metry is used by energy utilities, real estate companies and energy service providers that wants to make energy a bit more understandable and engaging to everybody. The volume of data generated by smart buildings has accelerated rapidly during the past five years. The data, produced by a mix of complex building automation systems, is aimed at making buildings more sustainable and profitable. In short, sustainability has become a business.

Graphensic AB is located in Sweden. The company was founded in November 2011 and became the first European supplier of epitaxial graphene on silicon carbide. Graphensic supplies epitaxial graphene on silicon carbide. We strive to aid our customers in developing next generation technologies. Our products are manufactured using our patent pending “High Temperature Graphene Process”, resulting in high quality products aiming for commercial use.

We are Martti and Tiia, a former rocket scientist and a chef who want to bring back the way we used to eat at home. We want to do it so even our grandma would be proud. We want to do it to create a healthier lifestyle for planet earth and for the humans living on it. By using technology and re-thinking everything from shopping to kitchen and delivery, we aim to replace home cooking on weekdays in a way that is healthy, sustainable and delicious.

ELSK® mirrors our love for fashion, quality and unique designs. It is also a dream about bringing sustainability & organic garments into the fashion industry. At ELSK, we want to build a fashion brand where quality, sustainability and pride actually matter. So instead of finding out how much you can get for as little as possible, we want to help you work out what you simply can’t live without.

BrainCapture provides electroencephalogram (EEG) services tailored to the needs and available resources in low and middle-income countries by delivering a low cost mobile-based EEG equipment for tele-delivery of recordings, providing a cloud-based EEG diagnostics support services and AI-based recording quality control and diagnostics support. We provide a low cost AI enhanced epilepsy tele-neurodiagnostic services for use by non-expert staff.

We believe that every child with obesity should have the right to receive adequate help and support. Our mission is to help these children and their families to form a healthy and sustainable lifestyle. What we do is to digitalize clinical childhood obesity treatment. We provide a platform that connects clinics with their patients. Childhood obesity is a major global health issue leading to cognitive and psychosocial problems and several non-communicable diseases. “Childhood obesity is one of the most serious public health challenges of the 21st century” – Global Strategy on Diet, Physical Activity and Health, WHO. Successful childhood obesity treatment brings on a life-style change resulting in a sustainable weight after an initial relative weight loss. There are effective traditional methods but they require almost weekly meetings with the caregivers (USPSTF 2017), something that the families struggle to handle and the society cannot afford on any significant scale. We bring on a new treatment paradigm based on measurable outcome instead of process goals. This lowers the risk of giving incorrect advice and reduces the stress associated with treatment. Our program is enabled by data collected at home. The data is presented to the families in a way that promotes self-management of health, while it’s presented to the healthcare professionals in order for them to intervene in the pivotal moments for their patients’ success. More patients can thus be treated with a fraction of the resources per patient compared to traditional methods. Our clinical results are outstanding and have been verified in clinical trials. The clinics’ benefits The clinics get an overview of all their registered patients and their progress as well as access to built in tools for planning and managing their work. Evira makes it possible for the clinics to continually keep track of their patients and intervene in the pivotal moments for their success. The revolutionary aspect with the Evira treatment concept is that it is based on reliably measured outcome instead of self-reported behaviour. Evira is a tool to provide treatment but we are also integrating manuals and recommendations that makes it possible for any clinic to work in an effective manner. Evira makes it possible for clinics to provide effective treatment with a fraction of the resources per patient compared to current/traditional methods. The families’ awareness of their progress makes the process less stigmatized which makes the visits more focused. The reduced stigmatization and continuous contact also leads to fewer late cancellations and missed appointments – which are significant cost drivers for clinics today. The families’ benefits The families get an easy way of getting in touch with the clinic for assistance through the mobile application as well as access to scientifically validated educational material. The main benefit is that they will get high quality treatment with much less perceived effort and with less frequent visits compared to current methods with comparable clinical results.

Atlas Kompetanse is a company that works to prevent outsiders among children and young people. We provide relief measures to the municipality's child welfare and refugee services. We offer flexible assistance measures tailored to the families we guide. Atlas Kompetanse was established in response to the deficits we experienced in our work with newly arrived families. The parents we meet wish to give their children the best support they can, but they don’t have sufficient information. Misunderstandings and poor comunication complicates the issues uneccesarily. Atlas Kompetanse would like to prevent this by improving the dialog and extend the parents’ understanding of the system so the can make cognizant decisions for their children. We are a team with high expertise in families with minority backgrounds. Our employees have at least three years of basic education, most of whom have a further education or a master's degree. We speak nine languages together, have a unique multicultural expertise and long experience with family work. We have a holistic approach to our work. We focus on socio-economic conditions, the minority perspective, as well as child welfare focus - to change the upbringing conditions of the children. We work interdisciplinary and collaborate with many different agencies around the family. We consider this to be important in order to achieve a holistic approach.

The best interface is no interface. Automating the home - improving security, simplifying life, saving energy, providing peace of mind - shouldn't be about "controlling your home from your phone", it should be about making life easier. So Viva get to know the family, and adapts automatically, letting the user put the phone down, while still getting all the benefits of a smart home. Viva Labs was founded in 2012 with the aim of making smart home security a mass market product. By using artificial intelligence, Viva simplifies smart homes, making them valuable to users. The company enables partners within the utility, telecommunications, and other industries to quickly launch cutting edge smart home products under their own brand, strengthening their existing product portfolio, driving revenue, and increasing customer loyality. The first Viva-based solution launched in Norway in November 2015 under the Vord brand.

Welcome to a modern smartphone marketplace that combines the best features of online flea markets and online stores. Say goodbye to scammers, manual selling, product pictures, agreeing where to meet, calling sellers up and all the rest! Swappie.com is a safe and secure online store for used smartphones where you can order little-used, affordable smartphones directly from our store, which have been tested and refurbished using the newest technology. Our precise quality control allows us to provide a 12-month Swappie Warranty™ for all our phones. The story of Swappie began in 2015 when the Finnish founders of the company, Sami and Jiri, tried to buy a used phone from an online flea market. However, a seller with a trusted profile turned out to be a professional cheater and never delivered the product he was selling. Sami and Jiri noticed that they weren’t alone with their problem. There is a growing interest in buying used equipment, and online flea market scams have become increasingly professional. Towards the end of 2016, enterprising merchants who tested various business ideas began building a marketplace that makes buying and selling used smartphones easy and safe. Now a fast growing team of over 150 people is working on the Swappie Mission. We want to provide our customers with a more affordable and environmentally friendly way to upgrade their phones. Swappie’s work is primarily customer-oriented and we emphasize openness and the importance of learning in our work.

We deliver simple, clean & affordable energy. Solar energy is quickly becoming an attractive source of energy for buildings, also here in the Nordics. Contrary to previous beliefs, solar is well suited for the Nordic climate; the solar insolation of Southern Sweden and Norway is at level with central parts of Germany (Europe’s largest market for solar installations), and our cold climate is favorable for the panels’ performance. Simply Solar is a one-stop-shop for any business who wants to use the latest solar PV technology to ensure their own, self-produced, clean electricity supply. We take care of every step of the process, from planning, engineering, financing and installing, to optimizing your building’s energy consumption. We use experienced, local, certified installers and the highest quality components to ensure your installation meets strict quality standards.

SafeBikely is the next generation bike lockers. We are a group of entrepeneurs with deversified background working towards a common goal: enable cities to increase their share of cyclists. By using the latest technology and connectivity we make secure bicycle parking available for all municipalities. Our vision is to increase the share of bicycle commuting in urban environments by offering smart, secure bicycle parking at low investments costs which down pays it self. Enabling municipalities to fulfill their climate goals and create greener, smarter cities. We are developing the worlds most advanced back-end system for secure bicycle parking, yet it's so easy to use. SafeBikely will be a toolbox for city planners and municipalities to manage cycling statistics and creating big bike data.

Vital Beats is an interdisciplinary MedTech company which is located in Copenhagen, Denmark. Our software platform delivers clinical decision-support for the treatment and care of remotely monitored pacemaker patients. Specifically, the platform intelligently combines multiple data sources to predict the occurrence of future complications, whereby clinicians can intervene in due time. Specifically, our mobile app gives patients insight into their own care and lets them take action on their disease from home. The clinical of the platform uses advanced analytics to predict worsening and to filter incoming data and turn noise into valuable insights for clinicians.

We bring people together through warm technology. Social isolation and loneliness strikes the most vulnerable groups in society hardest. Two of the most exposed groups are those over the age of 80 years and children and young adults with long-term illness. Step by step, we are working towards our main goal: to eradicate involuntary loneliness and social isolation. These are global issues affecting anyone, and we are growing rapidly to meet demand and to fight loneliness on a larger scale. Communication technology brings people together across borders and generations. But too much technology is made for those who are moving fast in the world to be able to move even faster. We believe that technology should be created for those who need it most, and work hard every day to find well-tailored solutions for those who do not use communication solutions today. We develop niche products that are just as stylish and functional for our end users as generic products are for the mass market.

At the beginning, Motosumo was super technical. It was about numbers and algorithms and machine learning. Today, it’s about something else, too. It’s about accessibility. It’s about community, about people coming together to enjoy fitness and make friends. Everyone at Motosumo shares the same philosophy. Motosumo makes group fitness fun and inclusive with an app packed full of gamification features and advanced tech. Using the sensors in smartphones, Motosumo provides analytics only found in expensive, high-end fitness equipment, which makes it a cheap and powerful instructor tool for any gym. Fitness solutions needn’t be super serious and elite. So we’re proud to have built something that was previously only available to pro athletes.

AutoGlove is a revolutionary glove system. With production and use of disposable gloves comes significant environmental challenges due to extraction of raw materials, fossil energy consumption, chemical use, transportation and waste. Autoglove reduces consumption of gloves, and thereby your environmental impact. AutoGlove lets you put on gloves in about two seconds. Employees are able to serve customers faster than previously, reducing the risk of customers exiting the queue during busy periods. Testings with customers have also proven AutoGlove to reduce glove use by up to 70%. Additionally, workers are more effective resulting in the possibility of staff reductions.

Cowedo is a common platform for sharing. Although there is a huge growth of new sharing economy services, the barriers of entry for new actors are high. A sharing economy startup i required to market, finance and develop its service from scratch. It’s difficult to estimate the cost of time and money for developing a sharing platform from scratch, but a simple marketplace with standard features such as user handling, listing management, booking and payment may take from 500 to 800 hours of development. The founders of Cowedo experienced these issues when planning to launch three different sharing platforms. How could this be done smarter and more efficiently? Analyzing the concepts and comparing acceptance criteria for the different platforms we discovered that most of the features were common and a minor part was custom. So the development of the sharing engine began. Using the sharing engine, anyone can create a new sharing economy site. Getting access to a no-code peer-to-peer marketplace builder and designers, a sharing site can be launched in hours by configuration. The sharing engine enables short time-to-market and saves you the IT costs. Another problem about the sharing economy today is the lack of operability between existing platforms. Only a few actors within the sharing economy are collaborating. We want to make it possible for the end users to combine goods and services across all marketplaces in the Cowedo Network.

We are a Food Experience Agency delivering unique food events for your purpose, while tasting, developing and creating our way towards greater food experiences for all. At Bite Me we want more people to happily eat better and live more sustainably. We believe the only way to achieve this is by revolutionizing how we eat and experience good stuff. Because better food starts with greater experiences! We have developed a process for how we can better experience better things. It draws on methodologies like Design Thinking and Service Design but also on the world of anthropology and performances. We call it Food Experience Design and it builds on these rules: quality, unusual, fun, relationships, and sustainability.

Changing the UV Led industry. CrayoNano is working to shut the door on mercury arc lamps used for UV today and be the technology leader in a huge and fast-growing market. Being transparent to all wavelengths, graphene represents the ideal substrate and transparent contact for ultraviolet light emitting diodes (UV LEDs). Nanowires on graphene enables critical improved internal quantum efficiency, operating lifetime, and reliability, especially for UVC. The result is UV LEDs with higher efficiency at significantly lower cost, resulting in a reduced cost performance ratio of more than a factor of 10. The cost performance ratio is defined as the price paid per watt of UVC output. Improving efficiency, reducing the energy consumption, and introducing this cost advantage will radically enable new applications and improve critical applications such as water and food processing disinfection, air purification and environmental monitoring and life science measurements. In addition, the use of the graphene substrate technology allows for substantial cost reduction of the UVC LED manufacturing process.

Ferroamp has created the EnergyHub system, a new future-proof way to integrate solar energy, energy storage and electric car charging into a system. Ferroamp has a scalable platform that offers the opportunity to combine patented technology in a proprietary EnergyHub with alternative energy sources and energy storage. In a unique solution, several buildings can also be linked together in a microgrid - Powershare. A number of products together provide a complete system for power equalization, energy storage, electric car charging and optimization of solar production.

SFTec was founded in 2013 as a spin-off company from the University of Oulu. The idea for our main product ModHeat stems from the metallurgical industries’ need for more cost-efficient material dryer. The solutions before were either too large and expensive or too small and inefficient. ModHeat is an affordable, scalable, mobile and continuous drying technology. It can handle many different materials and use waste heats as a heating source. Technology has been successfully piloted in industrial scale for industrial sludges, woodchips and animal manures among many other materials. Drying is one of the most common processes in many industrial sectors. Our technology is combining best properties of the two main dryers in market. Our benefits are lower price point and the ability to handle previously unused difficult material streams. With the possibility to use waste heats as an energy source, ModHeat is proftable even for low-value material streams. Technology is fully scalable to any capacity needed. With ModHeat technology and our services, we can solve drying needs of any scale. We are an innovative technology company and experts in drying technologies, process engineering and circular economy.

Platform for remote battery fleet monitoring, optimal and responsible battery use, and predictive maintenance. It is an IOT solution with integrated “Big Data” analytics in the cloud that provides the battery intelligence to our customers in the utility sector, for example logistics operator using electric forklift trucks. The RETROFIT Bamomas (TM) solution consist of our own cheap IOT sensor device with embedded wireless connection (only Voltage, Current, Temperature and Electrolyte - if needed) that sends the data to cloud computing platform that stores both the data and provides the battery intelligence to our customers. Contrary to many competing solution our cloud based approach allows us freely combine data from all kinds of customers, like users with very distributed fleets or from customers with large fleets in one site or in few sites.

Cgrain develops and produces instruments for visual grain quality control. By using advanced image analyzing technique our instruments can determine quality defects such as broken kernels, foreign seeds, ergot, wild oats, burnt or green kernels etc. We provide our costumers with a modern and objective method for controling the quality of unprocessed cereals which are labor efficient, easy to use and precise. Our instrument, Cgrain Value, are developed for analyzing whear, rye, barley, oats and peeled oats. With a unique mirror design, Cgrain is able to view at least 90% of the surface of each kernel, making it an accurate way to determine any defects. The manual method for analysing grain quality with visual defects is subjective, labour intensive as well as strenuous for neck, shoulders and wrists. Cgrain offers an objective solution, its easy to use and reduces the need for manual labour.

iCellate is a Swedish, medical technology disrupting cancer care. Founded in 2011 and based in Stockholm, iCellate develops products in the areas of cancer diagnosis and individual cancer treatment. The technology is based on research from the Karolinska Institute in collaboration with the Karolinska University Hospital and the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm. iCellate's is a pioneer in liquid biopsy, by detecting and analyzing circulating tumor cells (CTC) and circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA). Our hope is that CTC testing will be able to contribute importantly to complementing and improving today's screening methods. A vision would be to use CTC screening during the most relevant periods of one’s life, i.e. when the risk is the highest. In addition, if you could initiate early targeted treatment you should be able start managing cancers at an early stage with the commensurate hope of more effective cures. We are working to be an important part of that solution.

Our world is being digitized at a mind-boggling pace, and everything that can be digitized, will be digitized. However, most companies in traditional, utility-oriented industries such as energy, insurance and telecom fail to engage their homeowner customers with value-adding digital touchpoints and data-driven meaningful engagement. Consequently, they fail to create new revenue streams and retain the customer ownership despite their unique access to every home or building. Anyware’s unique end-to-end Digital Services and Data Analytics platform enable these companies to provide data-driven, meaningful customer engagement and create new revenue streams by turning the customer’s data into insights and personalized digital services. The digital services platform enable the Anyware partner to cater for a variety of segments as well as changing needs in the lives of end-user customers around these main applications: - Room Monitoring in buildings (offices, schools, institutions) - Smarter Living for households in terms of family safety and prevention - Care Monitoring for elderly living alone and their next-of-kin

We use technology to prevent accidental dislodgement of IV tubes. Intravenous (IV) therapy, the most frequent invasive procedure, is unsafe for both patients and healthcare staff. Around 80% of in-hospital patients receive IV therapy through a tube, which is all too often accidentally pulled out during use. The most affected patient groups are children and the elderly, accident rates as high as 36% have been reported. An annual 3.8 billion tubes are used in Europe and the USA, making this a massive problem. The issue of medical tubes being pulled out during treatment, putting patients at risk of being injured, is alarming.
