Apart from patient injury, the consequence of dislodgement includes interrupted therapy, loss of blood and medicine, exposure of patients and healthcare staff to toxic/allergenic medication and contaminated blood and increased workload for the healthcare staff. The annual financial burden of accidental dislodgement of IV tubes for European and the USA healthcare is estimated at €28.3 billion. Another consequence of dislodged IV tubes is the environmental burden of plastic waste. Approximately 23,000 tonnes of plastic waste is generated in Europe and the USA per year. An estimated 15,200 tonnes of plastic would be saved after the introduction of ReLink®.

We help you find the best and cheapest repair or service for your smartphone, tablet or computer. Our mission is to provide Danish consumers with all the information needed to make the best decisions regarding all types of repairs and products. By offering an independent and free workshop portal to compare, we focus on helping everyone find the right repair as well as save time and money by booking one more time. By using Reppy.dk, you avoid being cheated by opaque prices and quality. When you book a repair at Reppy.dk, you know exactly what you will get before you pay for it.

We are developing the next generation of accessible games primarily designed for those visually impaired. Our aim is to set a new standard in game audio, emphasize the quality and truthfulness of the experience and become the market leader in accessible games for the visually impaired. We have always believed that creating games for the visually impaired with the visually impaired is the key to fulfilling higher standards and reaching our goal. We are myTrueSound, and we hear the difference. We hope to set an example for other companies in the entertainment industry to recognize the need for accessibility.

GCE is for all persons and for all types of companies and organizations - not only for cleantech or social enterprises, but all having sustainability as a value can show their green company effect. Individuals sign in to make their green personal effect by sharing their good deeds and challenging friends and companies, liking and commenting. Seeing the good deeds of companies, helps us all in making sustainable choices. Companies get value for their sustainable actions when they are easily visible to customers and business partners. Companies can find business partners with same values and hopefully get inspiration to reach even more ambitious goals in doing sustainable business. In GCE, sustainability covers environmental and social aspects. UNs 17 Sustainable Development Goals are the foundation for the actions in GCE. Our mission is to make the sustainable efforts of businesses and organizations visible and transparent to public, and in turn to give public a chance to influence sustainability through their choices. We want to activate both companies and public to think and act in a more sustainable way.

Evaxion is disrupting the drug discovery process. With some of the most talented bioinformaticians, scientists, and executives in the field, Evaxion is committed to bringing the vision for better global health to reality. Through collaboration with leading institutions and companies and an expert panel of scientific advisors, we hope to redefine medicine and impact the lives of patients. We have developed two unique artificial intelligence platforms, PIONEER and EDEN that utilize and integrate the power of neural networks, big data, and supercomputing to identify the most suitable targets for immunotherapies targeting cancer and infectious diseases.

ObsteCare AB is a provider of medical solutions with a global focus on improving delivery care for both the mother and the healthcare provider. The company was founded on groundbreaking research at the Karolinska Institute, based upon the effect of lactate in the amniotic fluid of delivering mothers. The products originating from the research are the result of more than 20 years of in depth knowledge of the practical situation in delivery wards. They work on ensuring safer deliveries, with a deeper intelligence about challenging births and supporting the woman and the health care professionals in creating the best possible birth. This is done by supplying reliable services and products, facilitating efficient care in maternity wards. With focus on cutting edge technology, ObsteCare provides innovative solutions helping to improve quality of care during the delivery process. The product line is built on a patented technology and is the only solution available on the market for Point-of-Care use in monitoring lactate in amniotic fluid.

We are the first company in the world to utilise IRG2-process in its gas turbines. IRG2 stands for “intercooled and recuperated, generator on both shafts” – this process enables high electrical efficiency. Through innovative design and together with our partners, we manufacture the most efficient gas turbines for the benefit of end-customers around the world to reduce their operating costs, improve their performance, and protect the environment. We believe that sustainable development is part of our responsibility for the environment. Therefore, sustainability is enshrined in our values. Energy efficient solutions, lifecycle optimisation and innovative solutions, all of which contribute to a more sustainable future in the energy industry.

Altris is a Swedish company who has discovered a new way to produce a sodium based cathode material using only renewable materials. This world-changing discovery enables a new generation of batteries that are not only friendly to the environment but also cheaper to produce than it’s competitors. Altris specialises in producing highly sustainable cathode materials for rechargeable sodium batteries, enabling rapid integration of renewable energy sources.

Againity utilizes low-grade heat and converts waste, such as incinerated or industrial waste, into electricity through a so-called ORC system (Organic Rankine Cycle). Thanks to an in-house developed patent-pending turbine, the system can utilize heat down to 90 degrees Celsius – and still have a short payback time for systems down to 50 kW of electricity produced. They aim at reducing CO2 levels by 24 million tonnes annually by 2028.

ADDI Medical has developed a new digital solution enabling collection of health information from the individual - effectively, safely and in compliance with legal requirements. Our technology offers a unique tool for healthcare players, such as health providers and the life science industry, to receive and analyze patient generated information in real life at their homes, and thereby, provide patient centered care. With ADDI Medical's solution, HOPE - Healthcare Operability with Patient Engagement, we support health systems' struggles with increasing costs, pressure from a wide range of chronic and severe conditions, as well as, their ability to offer equal access to healthcare.

At Robotto, we are integrating vision and navigation algorithms to monitor and analyze wildfires aided by the use of autonomous drones! We are a group of engineers from the Robotics bachelor at Aalborg University. That sprung as entrepreneurs by developing a new autonomous tool for wildfire data gathering. Our mission is to develop autonomous systems, no matter the field or scale, creating a easier more sustainable world through the integration of robotics. Our first product focuses on monitoring and data gathering of wildfires with quadcopters for a faster and more accurate method of assessment.

VIBRANTCREATOR is a collaboration software company facilitating growth and investments in scale for Startups and SMEs. Our tools make it easier for entrepreneurs to build their businesses and for investors to access up-and-coming companies. Our solution allows entrepreneurs to access the tools and connections needed for growth and provides key stakeholders in the entrepreneurial ecosystem with the opportunity to optimise their processes for the identification of potential prospects, due diligence, and the ability to manage a large number of selected prospects over time.

Startup Guide is a publishing and media company that produces guidebooks and online content to help entrepreneurs navigate and connect with different startup scenes across the world. As the world of work changes, its mission is to guide, empower and inspire people to start their own business anywhere. Founded by Sissel Hansen in 2014, Startup Guide today has books in over 30 cities in Europe, the Middle East, Asia, Africa and the US, including Copenhagen, London, Tel Aviv, Cairo, Tokyo and New York. In autumn 2018, the company launched a media website, startupguide.com, which was born out of the desire to explore different types of content and reach a wider audience by taking advantage of the digital medium. At the core of Startup Guide’s two physical stores in Copenhagen and Lisbon is the belief that there’s nothing like real-life experiences and seeing and feeling actual products. The stores, which double as offices for the company’s 15-person team, promote products by startups as well as showcase Startup Guide books.

We want to make a community of Savings, a community of Impact! We are a community marketplace where you can post discounted items and help reduce all kinds of waste, starting with madsplid. Our mission is to connect the savings you want, while making a positive impact. How? A simple to use community driven app that bridges a community of savings with a community of impact. We are focused on redirecting, using and re-purposing items before they before they go to waste.

The Platform and app for relatives – meeting the needs of a relative! Relabee helps you with the many tasks you have as a relative. In a quick and easy manor you can create your own network of helpers, and afterwards Relabee will help You get an overview of all your activities, gather your communication in one place, organize your appointments and delegate tasks. Gather your network: There are many practical tasks where friends, family and close people can help to ease everyday life. With Relabee you can easily invite the people you want to involve in your network of helpers. You can coordinate appointments, share knowledge about the disease, tell news and distribute messages to everyone at once. Share knowledge and get an overview:  There is a lot of information to keep track of during a course of disease. Therefore, it is important to store all information concerning the disease in one place. With Relabee you get a treatment calendar that is developed to make it easier to keep track of appointments, diagnoses, messages, therapists and treatments. It is also a helpful tool when you have to tell new therapists about the course of disease. Get help with practical tasks: With Relabee you can easily delegate the practical tasks to the network, so you can focus on being a caring relative. You get a task sharing feature, so you can easily pass on practical tasks to be undertaken during the course of a disease. This includes everything from moving, collecting medicine, transportation to the doctor, cooking and much more. With the sharing of tasks, everybody in the network can easily offer to solve tasks, when they want to contribute. Get targeted professional help  Although the network of relatives is well-functioning, it may be necessary with professional help. In Relabee you will prospectively get access to a number of relevant offers from professional therapists and practitioners within health, transport, food and more

Åpenhet is a Norwegian GovTech company based in Oslo and Paris. We specialize in good governance & data driven policy making. We provide services to public administrations and organisations across Europe. Our primary goal is to foster international cooperation through knowledge and data sharing.

Kamupak is offering a digital deposit system for reusable packaging. We are replacing single-use take away packaging with reusables. We make reusability easy and safe. The business model is based on the volumes of package reuse. The main parts of the service include: deposit system platform, reusable packages, pick-up and return points, storage management for the customer and Kamupak's purposes, cleaning of the packages and running the logistics.

Solved is a marketplace for sustainability-related knowledge work where you can find, hire and work with the experts you need to create smart, sustainable and resource-efficient solutions. At Solved, we believe that everyone can go smart, clean and sustainable with the right kind of help and connections. There is vast potential to create a positive change in the world, simply by utilizing existing solutions and experts. Unfortunately, they are often scattered around the world and are difficult to find, access and engage, without knowing exactly what you are looking for. Our goal is to lower the access barrier to top expertise that are crucial for impact. We strive to enable anyone to connect with the experts they need, share project opportunities and develop a flexible network of go-to people for on-demand work to create solutions that are optimal for the environment, and make good business sense.

Hundreds of millions of girls and women are suffering from different forms of violence and oppression. Also, 12 million girls are forced into marriage every year, end of childhood, end of education. We believe that every girl has the right for education, equality and empowerment. Every woman has the right to live free from violence and oppression. We are a service provider creating an ecosystem between impact makers, small-scale fundraisers, NGOs, and, of course, girls and women who need support to live the life they want. We provide tools and processes to help these small NGOs run their operations in an efficient way to create a long term impact. These tools and processes are our requirements for the NGOs to get access to our services. Our business model is commission based. We offer a community and a place to follow up the cause you are impacting on. We take a predetermined percentage from the payment made. We Encourage helps NGOs to serve their donors better, with our tools to show where the money actually is being collected for, and how much is reserved for covering the fundraising costs for We Encourage and for marketing the cause. After the fundraising is done, we help with the follow-up marketing, showing people how and where their donated money is being spent. By that donors are able to see how their help has been making a difference in people’s lives.

Pinoa Foods builds automated vertical hydroponics systems powered by renewable energy for vertical farming, utilising latest technological solutions. In addition, Pinoa produces microgreens, baby leaves and edible flowers in an urban environment, which they cater to restaurants and grocery stores. Microgreens are shoots of salads, with strong flavours and exceptional nutritional values. Pinoa wants to revolutionize the current food production model, introduce the latest production technologies to the Finnish market and constantly expand its range with new, interesting alternatives.

The Upright Project is building incentives for companies to optimize their net impact. That means thinking what they actually achieve - and with what resources. In addition to being pretty necessary, it can even be fun. We takle this challenge by building a model to quantify companies' net impact on the environment, health, society and knowledge which we use to build incentives for companies to optimize their net impact. To be more precise: Understanding of the net value creation of companies should not rely on marketing slogans and pictures of dolphins/orphans/oceans on food packaging. We want to put scientific knowledge to good use by summarizing it into net impact profiles of all products and services currently traded in global markets. We build tools for investors, employees and consumers to use these impact profiles in their everyday decision-making.

Decision-making in geriatric medicine is often a complex process that needs to take into consideration an array of different factors. Vilja Care is a software company that is focused on enabling the best possible care for geriatric patients by optimizing geriatric care decisions through data analysis, process management, machine learning and AI. Our platform, Vilja, provides doctors and nurses with a unique tool facilitating clinical decision making and improving the quality of life of patients. Geriatric medicine is concerned with the medical care of the frail older person and aims at promoting of better health in old age. We consider new data processing technologies a huge opportunity to improve geriatric care processes world-wide.

While working in the humanitarian field for five years, I witnessed a critical need for a software that supports rapid deployments. We needed a solution to manage and mobilize staff to be deployed into disaster areas, in situations where time is of essence. However, there were no tools available to us. I set out to see how others were solving the issue, to see if there are any viable solutions in the market. But what I found was a lot of excel files which were not very efficient. There were also some the heavy weight solutions built upon the larger ERPs or CRMs. Molnix was born to fill this gap, spearheaded by the product Rapid Personnel Manager. It is a cloud-based HR app that is now in production in the humanitarian field – the Finnish Red Cross being our public reference customer. The goal now is to bring Rapid Personnel Manager to as many customers as possible. We will start by targeting humanitarian agencies. The app’s logic applies well to many other sectors to follow; manpower agencies, security services, freelance guilds and more can benefit from our service. With this app, our customers’ HR activities become considerably faster and more cost efficient. Especially in the field of disaster management, speed translates to higher impact (such as lives saved or aid delivered). Cost savings in turn stem from automation of many HR tasks such as alerting, reporting, data quality monitoring and use of public API:s. Cost savings are also a function of offloading work from the registry owner through enabling end users to perform many of the tasks themselves. Our Rapid Personnel Manager (RPM) is a cloud application to manage human resources, training, and work contracts. It is specifically designed to serve HR needs where speed, automation and support for a global workforce as well as global operations are key. It aims to improve the humanitarian work globally.

Nuuka Solutions is a Finnish software company with a new BIG DATA platform for commercial and public buildings to improve energy efficiency, indoor air quality and sustainability. Nuuka can be used to centrally monitor and manage energy efficiency, indoor air quality and HVAC processes performance of the entire real estate portfolio. Nuuka also provides the asset level sustainability data which is compatible for general surveys like GRESB and GRI. The Nuuka SaaS is a fully device manufacturer-independent system which helps to automate data collection directly from energy meters, building automation systems, IoT systems, and utility companies etc. We stand out from our many single solution competitors by providing one single all-inclusive building management software. It is comprised of a basic data collection platform with additional application modules. Employees from different areas of the real estate company can access and share building information in real time, improving indoor climate conditions, space efficiency, customer satisfaction, technical process performance, sustainability, and reducing unnecessary energy usage and waste generation. The result is optimally managed buildings with happier and healthier tenants and a reduced environmental impact. Nuuka Solutions operates through its growing partner network. Local partners such as energy management companies have been able to produce significant improvements in energy efficiency by using Nuuka’s analysis and reporting tools. Energy efficiency improvements have been up to 35% annually, and at the same time indoor air quality has been improved.

EcoReal is an energy service oriented company who develop, design, build, fund and optimize projects that save energy, reduce energy costs and increase the value of our customer´s real estate portfolio. Our main core values are sustainability, accountability and efficiency. These values when combined with our extensive experience and customer oriented approach, are key factors to EcoReal´s daily operations and customer experience aspirations. EcoReal´s solution is a true turnkey energy oriented service. Every project is executed efficiently with an optimum focus on long term quality and sustainability. As a result, our clients receive real estate solutions which are energy efficient and environmentally friendlier, which means that the building emits lower CO2 emissions, is more affordable to use and the conditions are improved. Improved conditions increase the end user´s comfort and work efficiency, creating a better customer experience overall. Technically, this is due to energy efficient lighting, heating, cooling and use of renewable energy. The people of EcoReal are professionals in energy efficiency and project management. They are knowledgeable in commercial real estate, understanding of client demand, vision and management of the ‘big picture’. EcoReal believes in bringing practical world-friendly ‘tech’ to the real estate and construction industries. We have partnered with CoreFactory to create 'Optiwise'. Optiwise will bring the future to energy management by providing intelligent tools for optimizing and controlling energy consumption in realtime, within the parameters that really matter.

Klinik AI was created to automate healthcare processes all the way from screening, to cataloguing symptoms, and directing patients to an appropriate clinical pathway. Klinik provides state-of-the-art, intelligent digital solutions, rendering traditional approaches obsolete. The clinically proven Klinik AI integrates numerous medical databases with real medical cases and studies to make it unique and highly accurate. Klinik Healthcare Solutions is a health technology company that produces AI-powered solutions for healthcare providers to enable better healthcare for all. We create clinically proven solutions and services for condition and urgency recognition, customer segmentation and patient flow management. We are a team of 30 professionals and we have offices in Finland, the UK & Mexico. Our core team consists of doctors, designers and engineers who share a common vision of making appropriate healthcare accessible to all. Drawing vast knowledge through operations with leading healthcare organisations and nations, we possess industry leading expertise on how patient pathways should be arranged in order to deliver high quality care and cost-effective processes. We serve a wide range of healthcare professionals and health service providers, including both public and private hospitals, clinics and emergency rooms. Our solutions have also been implemented within pharmacies and insurance companies.

Nurture resilience, empathy and global citizenship with meaningful and inspiring human stories from across the globe! Lyfta is a multi-award winning teaching tool designed in Finland and the UK. It is an all-in-one, easy to navigate, platform which works to build vital skills and values by giving children access to human story-based learning experiences from around the world. Lessons can be accessed with a computer or tablet and internet connection. The platform delivers a series of stunning, interactive and immersive 360-degree storyworlds and over 100 lesson and assembly plans. Lyfta is ideal for teaching literacy, PSHE, geography and citizenship, as well as values and skills such as empathy, resilience and critical thinking. At a time when children are largely confined to the home, expanding their horizons and giving them access to a world beyond their immediate environment is more important than ever. Lyfta was founded by award-winning filmmaker couple Serdar Ferit and Paulina Tervo in 2016, with the desire to inspire future generations to make a positive impact in the world. Lyfta’s platform was created to support teachers in tackling complex themes and topics with the best tools to introduce different global phenomena in the classroom. The vision: inspiring children to grasp their role in building a fairer, more sustainable world.

Miils is a nutrition-based SaaS product that works at the point of purchase and nudges people individually to eat healthier and in a more sustainable way. Our mission is to increase the well-being and accomplish a permanent change to better in the way people eat. Miils solutions cover the entire process from selecting suitable food or ready meals to buying them online in an easy and comfortable way. Miils SaaS products can be smoothly integrated to existing platforms, working as a thin layer on top of the client´s systems. Miils includes all the needed items to nudge users individually towards healthier options: Miils can turn recipes smart (including nutritional information), create individual meal plans, introduce assisted purchasing features, improve the purchasing experience, and pay for the purchases.

At Gasera we are passionate about helping solve the major global challenges that face society today. We are immensely proud that our unique trace gas measurement products, have for several years now, helped protect the environment and kept people safe from exposure to harmful and deadly gases. We’ve also helped our industrial customers become more energy efficient and green, by providing a real-time insight into many different manufacturing processes through our accurate and rapid part per billion (ppb) level gas detection products. At Gasera, we are continually striving to make our measurement solutions even better for our customers, and making their gas detection requirements easier and lower cost across a wide range of industrial applications. Our unique patented technology is currently being miniaturized to provide robust, lower cost, portable and hand-held instruments that can still accurately and reliably detect a range of gases even down to parts per trillion (ppt) levels. This is only possible with Gasera’s patented photoacoustic MEMS technology. Our unique products benefit from a lifetime spent pioneering and developing our core technology by one of our company founder’s Professor Dr. Jyrki Kauppinen. He had the vision and expert understanding that this technology uniquely offered the possibility for robust, accurate, rapid, part per trillion (ppt) level detection in small and lower cost formats, unlike all other selective gas detection systems which typically cannot be miniaturized without losing most of their sensitivity. All of Gasera’s products have been developed by our team to be easy to use, low to no maintenance, and to provide the best possible performance at industry leading prices. Whether you are replacing slow, costly offline laboratory measurement of gas samples or looking to gain further insight with accurate and immediate gas detection in a challenging environment, we are here to help and have a product suitable for you.

KAMU Health Ltd develops and markets digital therapeutics for respiratory-illness care. Through technology, KAMU provides users and their healthcare providers with better data to support treatment while empowering users to take a proactive role in managing their conditions. All KAMU’s services are founded on the latest evidence-based medicine and comply with local medical regulations in the US and Europe.

The amount of medications increase substantially when patients have multiple conditions and illnesses. Polypharmacy is a well-known risk factor especially when it comes to problems related to the medication of the elderly. Long drug lists always require specialised medication reviews, which should also be revisited whenever medication or health conditions change. Pharmanalysis Oy is developing Causalus -software to solve the challenges related to polypharmacy. Causalus makes it easier and faster to review, monitor and standardise complex medications. As a result, harmful adverse effects of medication are minimized and the benefits maximized. It is a medication review software, which offers medication expertise as a cloud service. The software tracks not only drug dosing and interactions, but also treatment responses and possible adverse effects. We have combined digital medical care with remote pharmacist services. In addition, we also offer training modules in medication care for healthcare professionals. This creates value for multiple parties: patient health and wellbeing is dramatically improved, which then saves resources from healthcare professionals and generates massive savings for healthcare service providers, municipalities and societies.

Terkko Health Hub is an unique hub that consolidates startups, universities, libraries, accelerators and individuals who all share a passion for health and life sciences. It’s a place for all health enthusiasts to build amazing businesses and projects together. At the premises, we have the hub itself which caters a wide range of startups, Helsinki Think Company, Meilahti Campus Library and Well Terkko. Our values are set to reinforce equality, individual care and compassion to reinsure considerate and responsible development. At Terkko Health Hub, you have the possibility to develop in a collaborative environment working towards your goals. You can take advantage of our network of industry and research experts, investors, accelerators and entrepreneurs in order to advance your business to the next level. In addition, we have an open event space, that can be booked by request.

Fixpal.fi is an online marketplace for repair and maintenance services. Our service provides a better customer experience of getting used goods repaired compared to that of replacing them with new products. Our mission is to change people’s mindset towards: old is the new ”NEW” – repair instead of replace

It all begins in the summer of 2017 with a chance encounter in a coffee shop between two sneakerheads. Jesse Tran, with a background in sustainable manufacturing and Son Chu, who began his career in tech working with fashion-heavyweights at Zalando. Their conversation quickly turns into a discussion on fashion and its impact on the environment. An idea is formed: make a sustainable sneaker that sneaker enthusiasts actually want to wear. The first option the duo came up with was an organic cotton sneaker. A prototype is developed and the new sneaker is dubbed “Rens.” Originating from a mix of Ren in Swedish meaning “clean or unpolluted” and Ren stemming from the Confucianist virtue of compassion and benevolence. The cotton sneaker is quickly abandoned. Not sustainable enough. Cotton sneaker idea scrapped. Back to the drawing board. The search for new materials begins! ...back to coffee! The founders discovered that a high-tensile thread can be pulled from used coffee grounds creating a material with some very interesting properties: Fast-drying, odor-fighting, best sneakers-material-on-the-planet properties. We believe that sneaker enthusiasts deserve eco-friendly fashion that doesn’t slouch on features or style.

We believe that by bringing Health, Design and Technology communities together we can move towards a better future for human wellbeing. Health Design is a yearly event around the ideas improving public and individual health. Our goals: 1. Better Healthcare by Design. 2. Making connections that lead to new insights. 3. Design that improves patient life and adds value to Healthcare.

Better outputs by harnessing everybody´s brainpower – Embracing diversity, inclusion and accessibility by removing normal barriers with Altogame virtual tools! We specialise in developing immersive, serious / applied games and simulations for organisations and offering innovation training and coaching. Our vision is to change the way people innovate, collaborate and learn together. We enable them to ‘go beyond the obvious’ together. Altogame´s virtual 3D platform transforms the way people innovate, collaborate and learn. It breaks down barriers, fades out hierarchy and bias providing a level playing field for innovation and learning. AG saves time and money and reduced the need for travelling – it can engage unlimited number participants in different locations. Altogame´s unique set of features is enabled by the in-house competencies in modern game technology and science based behavioral design.

Our passion is to push energy efficiency to the maximum level and promote oil-free solutions in various industries. Therefore we help customers to significantly increase their solutions’ system efficiency, reduce material consumption and minimise maintenance costs. We provide design and prototyping of the high-speed electrical drivetrains supported by frictionless magnetic bearings. In a serial production, we provide active magnetic bearing systems. SpinDrive’s solution lowers the customer’s lifecycle costs by 35%. How? SpinDrive provides design and prototyping of the high-speed electrical machines and serials production of active magnetic bearing systems. SpinDrive reduces energy losses in the machine by half. For a 500-kW unit, this solution mitigates 200 tons of CO2 emissions annually, which is equivalent to 2,000 barrels of oil burnt and enables 2-year payback time. An active magnetic bearing levitates the rotational part of the machine, eliminating mechanical friction. It enables 20 years of maintenance-free operations. SpinDrive is completely oil-free, which allows Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEM) customers to enter rapidly growing markets and ensure an alignment with a contaminant-free environmental strategy.

SomeBuddy (Someturva in Finland) is an AI assisted digital legal service. With SomeBuddy anyone who has encountered bullying, abuse or threats in social media can report it easily and get SomeBuddy survival kit with legal advice and psychological first-aid customized to their specific needs. Our product is unique solution to the most topical problem of our time aiming to provide access to justice to all social media users globally. Protect your loved ones with SomeBuddy now!

Fiksuruoka.fi (Smart Food Ltd) is a Finnish startup that challenges traditional grocery market by selling surplus batches of food with large discounts in web store. The products are shipped all around Finland and the main goal is to reduce food waste that originates from mistakes in demand forecasting, changes in packages or short best before dates. Visionary business model combined with high expertise in digital marketing, growth hacking, procurement optimisation and service design have been keys for rapid growth. Fiksuruoka.fi offers an easy way for suppliers to sell their surplus batches and makes sure that the products end up to the end customers with a cost effective way. Suppliers save time and effort by selling the products as one big patch and that leaves more time to the profitable business of selling normal priced products. Fiksuruoka.fi has already obtained a large supplier base that ensures steady stream of surplus products and large selection of products.

Spark Sustainability enables and inspires people to make climate-friendly choices in everyday life. We give you science-based facts on greenhouse gas emissions, and show you the huge impact our actions have when we combine our efforts. But most of all, we show you that taking climate action isn’t about giving up on things, it’s about improving quality of life. We envision a world in which personal climate action drives business decisions, political agreements and technological advancement to stop climate change. Spark is building a bridge between conscious consumers and companies so that we can create this world together and mitigate one heck of a lot of emissions in the process.

Mapple’s urban intelligence software helps urban planners, real estate investors and developers use location data to evaluate and plan new developments. We apply multiple data sets from demographics and people flows to housing trends and serviceability to provide instant insights on investment potential. Why are we doing so? Every week 1.5 million people move to the cities. Municipalities and real estate industry have to work together to develop efficient infrastructure, housing and system of services that will increase livability while significantly reducing the impact on climate. Together with Finnish cities and urban planners, we developed data driven tools to understand how cities function and transformed them into an easy to use software to help cities and real estate companies with their everyday challenges.

Easy-to-use IT Solutions for Forestry. Our starting point is that the forest owner knows the state of his forest property and the measures taken against it, and the implementers know the state of the forest owner. With the help of Wuudis, forest operators manage the client's forest assets in a comprehensive and transparent manner, respecting the will and vision of the forest owner. Clear and easy terrain applications for mobile devices are our core competencies. Through the agile and user-friendly application services, we are agile to transfer our accumulated knowledge over the years. Wuudis is growing and evolving. You can be part of the new functionality produced by our agile software development team and released at regular intervals.

Kide Science helps 3 to 8 year-old kids get excited about the natural sciences through play-based learning, storytelling and dramatic arts. Our proven pedagogical methods are based on rigorous academic research conducted at the University of Helsinki, Finland. Our pedagogical approach is supervised by Jenni Vartiainen, who is a leading researcher in the field of play-based science education. Learning scientific thinking in early childhood predicts better learning outcomes in school. We support children’s scientific thinking through play-based learning. Kide Science was born through years of academic research done in Finland, where we developed our play-based STEAM concept for 3–8-year old children.

We care about people, society and the environment. Our goal is to create good, meaningful and delightful products that improve the world around us. Impact Club themes are a subset of the UNs Sustainable Development Goals: wellbeing, sustainable consumption & combating the climate change.

Rentmania is a peer-to-peer rental marketplace that introduces the goods-on-demand concept to the World. We equip every deal with insurance, delivery, and scoring for a hassle-free experience. Our long-term vision is to turn expensive goods into assets at no additional risk. It's the new philosophy of tech-enabled consumption for a sustainable future.

NordiComm is Finnish company specializing in building online communities. Our core values and mission are based on inventing and providing innovative products and services to fully capitalize emerging social media trends. We decode the basic human need to connect – and use that to help build deeper customer relationships. We decipher our client’s complex relationships with agencies, partners, customers, suppliers and any other members of their business eco-system. Based on that we build online communities for our clients, making it easier to collaborate, create, share and learn together. Now you could have your whole Social Media Community, designed, built, up and running in less than a month.

We know technology. We love children. We enjoy gaming. We do sports & education. By combining these, we will have a fun way to activate children to move more and create new ways to learn! We elevate education and games by developing interactive #techtoy and games with sport pedagogically legit content with our partners. With gamification and playable technology, we take traditional play to new dimensions. For doctors, the single most time-consuming task is typing in patient notes. This is time not spent on treating patients. Inscripta Medical is a modern and cost-efficient solution designed for dictating, optimizing and storing patient notes onto a company’s health record system. The solution comprises of a dictation application, AI-powered speech recognition, and personnel and workflow management system. Why Inscripta? - 3x less time spent on transcribing the dictations - 1-3 additional daily patients per doctor - Quality of service - Risk free, only pay for the use. No hidden costs

Funzi is a mobile learning service that gives the world’s billions of mobile users access to motivating and useful learning. We empower our learners to develop skills they need to build a better tomorrow with our service’s engaging experience and effective pedagogy. These intuitive mobile-friendly courses are created from high-quality content of trusted experts and combined with our unique mobile pedagogy to ensure lasting impact. Our core competence is in “funzifying” learning content through mobile pedagogy and gamification. Funzi is designed mobile-first and works on all connected devices, even lower-end feature phones. Learn on Funzi for free at: www.funzi.mobi We work with the UN System, NGOs, public organizations, and large private sector enterprises. Examples of our customers include UNDP Syria and Bidvest. We have provided cost-effective delivery and monitoring of mobile learning for over 5 million users in developing countries and crisis areas. We work towards the vision of a world without wars, a world where everyone is able to lead happy and healthy lives, and earn a meaningful livelihood.

DeskMe is an IoT-enabled desk reservation system for hot-desking offices and co-working spaces. Reserve a desk at your own office - or in the external office network, using an IoT-enabled real-time 3D map! DeskMe is an app for organizations that utilize hot-desking practice. It allows users to see their office map with real-time desk availability statuses and possibility to make a reservation. When an own office is fully booked - or simply for convenience - users are able to reserve a desk in an external network of office locations, members of DeskMe Portal. The idea originated from real problems the founders experienced - from a difficulty of finding a free desk or locating a colleague in the hot-desking environment to the challenge of booking a conference room in an unfamiliar city.

Kaiku Health was founded to improve the quality of life for cancer patients. Kaiku Health is a patient’s companion throughout different phases of therapy. It reduces uncertainty around symptoms by educating patients on their self-management strategies. Digital symptom monitoring can help cancer patients live longer, reduce ER visits and improve their quality of life. Algorithms triage patients’ symptom reports, which helps clinical staff prioritise their daily work. Multidisciplinary care teams have access to a comprehensive decision support dashboard, which enables intervening to symptoms early. Clinics using Kaiku Health report decreased phone call burden and more efficient patient visits and contacts. Regulatory-grade patient-reported outcomes data combined with clinical data opens significant new opportunities for evaluating the safety profile and effectiveness of treatments and their long-term outcomes in a real-world setting. This enables the development of new, better targeted ways to treat cancer.

AI for People defines what Silo.AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We believe that this is possible by accelerating human-machine co-operation for collective intelligence. Silo.AI is the largest AI solution and service provider in the Nordics that offers scalable expertise in machine learning, computer vision and natural language processing. The company serves clients across several industries on four continents. Some Silo.AI solutions include a tool for the Finnish airline Finnair to improve situational awareness and a tool to improve water quality at water treatment facilities for the global leading engineering company Ramboll. Silo.AI strongly believes in the future of human-centered AI solutions to provide strategic assets to the core business of its customers in a measurable, safe and explainable way.

Euformatics provides expert computational services at the intersection of life sciences and software. The mission is to bridge the gap between practicing life scientists and creators of new data analysis and modeling methods. The focus is in adapting cutting-edge research in computational methods and putting them to practice. Customers are biotech companies and healthcare providers in Finland and abroad. For over five years Euformatics has been developing practical, enterprise-level tools which bring published and validated technologies to support customers in both clinical diagnostics and translational research. The databases provide context to genome measurements by integrating knowledge from both academic research and user sources. Only sufficient context enables efficient analysis workflows for diagnostic and clinical research purposes.

Bono is the very first virtual AI personal trainer. It is not a chatbot but an entity that can take individual needs and variables into account. Bono can be a nutritional coach, sport coach, pharmacist, nurse and many other things. It's like a group of professionals in your pocket. Diske has created an ultimate AI engine that uses multiple datasets and series of algorithms for creating different kind of solutions to healthcare and wellness sectors. State of the art know-how is combined with the latest technologies and spiced up with evidence based medicine. The engine can be used to make different solutions in different industries. Different parts are already tested in both the healthcare sector (hospital, pharmacy) and corporate sector (food industry). Finnish based software company, specialized in health, wellness and web technologies. The intention is to make the best and easiest health management tool ever.

Naava is connecting humanity with nature, by making the smartest green walls on the planet. Naava has a vision, a mission, to deliver high quality natural air to all indoor spaces. Using cutting edge technology, and inspired by the purest air in the world, they have developed beautiful green walls which naturally purify the air we breathe. The name, Naava, derives from an indigenous Finnish moss that grows only in Finnish Lapland, and which only thrives in the cleanest air. We use bio-transformation and microbial filtration to bring this clean air to everyone. Combining millions of years of nature's evolution with the latest, most innovative artificial intelligence, Naava green walls optimize air quality and humidity and are 100 times more efficient than regular green walls. There is increasing evidence of the impact that poor quality air has on our performance and our health. Humanity spends more and more time in urban environments, locked away from natural air.

No distraction, just discussion – The most simple discussion forum solution. Heimo’s solution is a modern discussion forum of social media era. The Shortcut is a community-driven organisation that promotes diversity as an engine for growth. Founded by experienced entrepreneurs and scientists, Meru Health develops and delivers cost-effective, clinically proven and engaging digital solutions to empower people living with depression. Meru Health's digital clinic offers an app-based treatment program for depression, burnout and anxiety. The program combines technology, evidence-based therapy and daily support from licensed clinicians - the new standard of mental healthcare. The program is designed as a 12-week program divided into weekly themes in which the focus is on tackling mental health challenges with multiple approaches and by building habits to prevent relapses.

GreenStock was established in 2018 by architects from NTNU in close dialogue with property owners and the construction industry. GreenStock is a collaboration platform that handles recycling from A to Z. 40% of CO2 emissions and use of energy and water resources come from the construction industry in both Norway and Europe. At the same time, the industry and property owners experience that there are many challenges in reusing building materials: technical, legal and economic. Recycling should be easy and not least profitable.

Future Leaders is a new and bold approach to leadership education, a program designed to celebrate and support the development of more conscious leaders, ready to take on the glocal challenges of tomorrow. We build careers all the way from high school It should be possible for your company to connect with students without requiring a lot of paperwork, resources and time. We have tested out a concept that will increase well-being, security and knowledge of the future.

Accelerating People and Planet Sustainability. SOIstrat Consulting is a next practice management company with the vision to promote and accelerate People and Planet Sustainability in business value chains through a simple partnership for Sustainable Development Goals as a strategic approach to do business.

Efficient flood protection, made simple. Flooding has become a global problem, occurring more frequently while aIso being more destructive. We have certified the best repairers! Discreet and solid repair at fixed prices. A smarter boat life (google translate) Boating survey 2018 shows that on average 63% of Norwegian boat owners only use their boat eight times during the season. It is therefore a good solution to share a boat for both the boat owner and the environment. As a member of an electric boat pool, you help to make better use of both boat and coastal resources while reducing your own boat costs. When a pool is well organized, resources will be utilized optimally and create benefits for both the users and the environment.

Eliminate pollution from boats aroundthe world with electric propulsion. Electric propulsion for boats has again started to appear on lakes, waterways, and oceans and the numbers are rapidly increasing. Presently these are mainly small low voltage systems for slow displacement hulls. Evoy will move electric propulsion into faster planing hull boats. The range is still lower than for comparable ICE installations, but will be sufficient for many. Users will enjoy voyages without noise, smell, pollution and breakdowns. The significantly lower maintenance and usage cost will give owners peace of mind to use their boats like they should – every day.

At Lendonomy, we want to help young people build healthy relationships with money. Sometimes, when you’re young money seems to just slip out of your pockets and before you know, you’re broke and have no idea how to figure out a way to pay for your next meal. Lendonomy is a mobile-based social network for money with the P2P lending core, designed specifically for millennials and generation Z. It works as a mobile app on the user side and as a desktop app on the business side (for Lendonomy partners). Users exist within commonly shared pools of money, within which they can freely borrow and lend. A single user can be both a borrower and a lender. Lendonomy is building a financial product that is set to become a part of a popular culture with the vision to help youth build a healthy relationship with money.

Norway's leading ridesharing app According to NAF, an average Norwegian is standing in traffic jams for an average of 20 minutes during a car journey. During rush hour, drivers in Norway sit alone in 6 out of 7 cars. This results in long queues resulting in loss of time and money, as well as unnecessary CO2 emissions. By reducing car traffic by approximately 10% during rush hour, traffic will flow fine. The solution is rideshare with someone to and from a destination. To achieve this, we have developed a ridesharing app that connects people to daily destinations. By providing a platform connecting drivers and passengers in real time, without the need to publish trips in advance. Our users simply offer rides while leaving the breakfast table and SammeVei matches them with other users commuting the same way. By filling up cars’ empty seats, SammeVei helps reduce traffic and carbon emissions, while letting commuters easily share their commuting costs at the same time.

Actionable Insight for Adaptive Agriculture Sensonomic helps you improve your decisions by building digital versions of your operations. A dress that feels as good as it looks. Who said dressing comfortably had to be boring? Smart circular sustainable solutions snabling a multi-stakeholder transition to a Smart Circular Economy worldwide. To increase resource utilization through smart solutions supporting a transition to a Circular Economy. Safety. Flare is a button on your phone, and when you press it you get help from the nearest other helpers around you. Think of it as a digital version of the night names. Helpers. Network for female entrepreneurs, leaders and investors. In SHE we believe that better gender balance in business fuels innovation and growth. Spleis makes it easy to raise money for good ideas In short, we deal with public financing and want to make it easy for you to raise money for good ideas and good causes. Smart Symbiotech ASis a Norwegian-Hungarian company that provides consultancy services in the fields of wastewater treatment and biogas production. Our focus is firstly, on recycling technologies development for effective nutrient and heavy metal separation from wastewater treatment/biogas plants and their process emissions. These recovered resources are further processed into alternative chemical products as part of a circular economy scheme. It is a law to treat yourself a little extra help (Google translate) We all want to stay in our own home for as long as possible. Sometimes you need a little extra help KIND GROUP consists of several companies that work with innovation, digitalisation, system development and home care. We provide services at competitive prices so you can continue with your everyday life as before. Our goal is to enable our customers to stay longer at home.

Current developments in nanomedicine research has inspired iNANOD Co-Founders to start an entrepreneurial journey utilizing nanotechnology to improve cancer treatment. NANOD`s research is based on a nanotechnology-based platform, improving the efficacy and reducing side-effects of chemotherapeutic medications by optimizing drug delivery platform. This approach will ensure an optimal targeting and concentration of delivered drug to the diseased tissue. Our mission is to commercialize the research to benefit patients and society.

Share your Skill Identity - your verifiable certificates Today, displaced individuals and people in emerging markets are challenged by high costs and slow manual processes to verify the authenticity of their skills, identity and credentials. As a result, these individuals have to deal with tedious and out-dated credentialing processes, and are in some cases forced to repeat years of education. This leads to both loss of productivity and inflated unemployment. To tackle this challenge, Diwala has created a platform that enables schools and NGOs to issue skill-based identities, backed by blockchain technology. A skill-ID is a digitally verified record of a person’s educational and work history. Diwala is building an ecosystem of trust, by enabling educational institutions and organizations to safely and digitally issue and verify credentials. Our mission is to build an ecosystem of digital skill identities with verifiable credentials - to create global opportunities for youth and displaced communities.

Technology for sustainable growth in aquaculture. Hauge Aqua's believes that the current production platform based on open pen systems is too weak to sustain significant growth, recognised environmental performance and societal expectation. Hauge Aqua's ambition is to provide a trustworthy and competitive alternative production platform. Hauge Aqua presents a new robust enclosed technology for industrial fish farming. By our excellent team and collaborative partners, we offer the industry a fully contained system in which we address many of current costly challenges that apply in today's farming. The aim of the new technology is to enable sustainable growth in the aquaculture industry that may feed millions.

Innovating concrete inspection for critical infrastructure. Our solution helps answering many major challenges for players in verification, control, the construction industry, contractors, rehabilitation, road and subway, water and sewer, power, real estate, insurance and building conservation. We offer advanced technology and rolling scanning to reveal fast and risk-free insights into structures, buildings, bridges, installations and structures. Collected data reveals the concrete structure and shows real-time 3D imaging for increased actionable insight. Our inspection therefore helps to ensure high quality and long life of the structure. Our leading-edge ultrasound system offers data and relevant information to make accurate decisions to safeguard assets, unlock productivity and economic benefits, and reduce environmental impacts.

Increased Physical and Mental Wellbeing. A motivational tool that stimulates older people and people with dementia to increased physical, mental and social wellbeing. Using an specially adapted indoor exercise bike, video and sound, the users can take cycle trips through familiar surroundings and childhood memories. Humans are equally valuable, independent of age and functional level, and we need to focus on each other’s abilities in stead of disabilities. The benefits have been documented through extensive use and several projects; Improved mobility; Fewer falls; Faster rehabilitation; Increased appetite; Reduced obesity; Reduction in aggressive behaviour and medication; Better sleep; Less pain; Improved physical, mental and social well-being; Inspiring for carers and family.

The world’s first virtual fencing system. A radical and disruptive innovation that can make farmers independent of expensive physical fences for their grazing animals. The system consists of a solar-powered GPS collar and a digital map. When an animal crosses the Nofence boundary the collar starts beeping. This warns the animal that a short electric shock will be sent from the collar if the animal continues to move in the same direction. The animals quickly learn the signals, and keeps within the boundaries. Nofence enhances animal welfare and promotes sustainable agriculture.

Lift more and fly longer with Alva motors. Alva was founded to meet the growing global energy demand with renewable technologies. We develop electric generators for production of clean energy and electric motors to convert this energy into motion. Electric motors and generators featuring lower weight, higher efficiency, better precision and lower noise and vibration than conversional electrical machines. Our aim is to accelerate the world’s transition to green energy by making affordable customized electrical machines available to everyone.

Online Psychology - Wherever You Are. Life can be difficult and everyone is searching for the key to happiness. Our psychologists will understand the challenges you are experiencing. They can help you make positive changes in your life, cope with life problems and treat mental health issues. Lifekeys offers personalized consultations with licensed psychologists over video and telephone, thus making it easier for anyone in need to get help at the convenience of their time and location. Children should know what is happening in the world and parents should have tools to support and help them talk about taboo and topical societal issues. The creators behind this project hope this book will be a great tool for parents and adults to address societal issues with children. The project simply started with the question "Mom, what's a refugee?". To respond sensibly, and to share the knowledge and attitude further with other adults and children wondering what is happening in the media and the world. When my son asked me if I could explain why the boy sleeps on the beach and what a refugee is, it was a reminder of how scared I am of the world awaiting my son. I felt a turmoil in my body I have never known before. That was my turning point as a parent. The turmoil triggered inspiration and made my empathy a commitment.

Take control of the air you breath. Every idea starts with a problem: radon testing for homeowners hasn’t improved in almost 30 years. Language Training tailored to your company. Capeesh helps companies with their foreign employees. We teach your foreign staff the language they need to be happy and productive at your company.
